tika-s0302t0:4_2: Tatrāti padaṃ ye desakālā idha viharaṇakiriyāya visesanabhāvena vuttā,
tika-s0302t0:4_6: tasmā idha desassa kālassa vā paṭiniddeso bhavituṃ arahati,
tika-s0302t0:4_9: Yasmā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu tatrasaddo dhammadesanāvisiṭṭhaṃ desaṃ kālañca vibhāveti,
tika-s0302t0:4_11: Tena tatrāti yattha bhagavā dhammadesanatthaṃ bhikkhū ālapi abhāsi,
tika-s0302t0:5_0: Nanu ca yattha ṭhito bhagavā “akālo kho tāvā”tiādinā bāhiyassa dhammadesanaṃ paṭikkhipi,
tika-s0302t0:5_1: tattheva antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitova tassa dhammaṃ desesīti?
tika-s0302t0:5_6: tampi tassa akālabhāvasseva pariyāyena dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:5_7: Tassa hi tadā addhānaparissamena rūpakāye akammaññatā ahosi,
tika-s0302t0:5_9: Tadubhayassa vūpasamaṃ āgamento papañcaparihāratthaṃ bhagavā “akālo kho”ti pariyāyena paṭikkhipi.
tika-s0302t0:5_10: Adesetabbadese adesanāya pana udāharaṇaṃ “atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi,
tika-s0302t0:5_11: vihārato nikkhamitvā vihārapacchāyāyaṃ paññatte āsane nisīdī”ti evamādikaṃ idha ādisaddena saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:5_12: “Sa kho so bhikkhave bālo idha pāpāni kammāni karitvā”ti evamādīsu padapūraṇamatte kho- saddo,
tika-s0302t0:5_15: satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”tiādīsu ādikālatthe,
tika-s0302t0:5_20: “Tasmā āmantesi evā”ti āmantane niyamo dassito hotīti.
tika-s0302t0:6_6: tasmā tadatthaṃ puna bhagavāti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti.
tika-s0302t0:6_9: Catūsupi parisāsu bhikkhū eva edisānaṃ desanānaṃ visesena bhājanabhūtāti sātisayena sāsanasampaṭiggāhakabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0302t0:6_10: idha bhikkhugahaṇanti dassetvā idāni saddatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”ti āha.
tika-s0302t0:6_11: Tattha bhikkhakoti bhikkhūti bhikkhanasīlattā bhikkhanadhammattā bhikkhūti attho.
tika-s0302t0:6_12: Bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti buddhādīhipi ajjhupagataṃ bhikkhācariyaṃ uñchācariyaṃ ajjhupagatattā anuṭṭhitattā bhikkhu.
tika-s0302t0:6_13: Yo hi koci appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito,
tika-s0302t0:6_14: so kasigorakkhādīhi jīvikakappanaṃ hitvā liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatattā bhikkhu.
tika-s0302t0:6_15: Parapaṭibaddhajīvikattā vā vihāramajjhe kājabhattaṃ bhuñjamānopi bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu
tika-s0302t0:6_16: piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjāya ussāhajātattā vā bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhūti evamettha
tika-s0302t0:7_2: bhinnattā pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhikkhū”tiādinā vibhaṅge āgatanayena.
tika-s0302t0:7_9: Bhikkhane sādhukāritā “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”ti vacanaṃ anussaritvā tattha appamajjatā.
tika-s0302t0:8_0: Hīnādhikajanasevitavuttinti ye bhikkhubhāve ṭhitāpi jātimadādivasena uddhatā unnaḷā,
tika-s0302t0:8_1: ye ca gihibhāve paresu atthikabhāvampi anupagatatāya bhikkhācariyaṃ paramakāpaññaṃ maññanti,
tika-s0302t0:8_2: tesaṃ ubhayesampi yathākkamaṃ “bhikkhavo”ti vacanena hīnajanehi daliddehi paramakāpaññataṃ pattehi parakulesu
tika-s0302t0:8_3: bhikkhācariyāya jīvikaṃ kappentehi sevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti,
tika-s0302t0:8_4: adhikajanehi uḷārabhogakhattiyakulādito pabbajitehi buddhādīhi ājīvasodhanatthaṃ sevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento dīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karotīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:9_0: Tattha sādhukaṃ manasikārepīti sādhukaṃ savane sādhukaṃ manasikāre ca.
tika-s0302t0:9_1: Kathaṃ pavattitā savanādayo sādhukaṃ pavattitā hontīti?
tika-s0302t0:9_2: “Addhā imāya paṭipattiyā sakalasāsanasampatti hatthagatā bhavissatī”ti ādaragāravayogena kathādīsu aparibhavādinā ca.
tika-s0302t0:9_5: dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:9_14: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta”nti.
tika-s0302t0:10_4: Ekacce bhikkhūti ye paṭiccasamuppādadhamme desanāpasutā, te.
tika-s0302t0:10_5: Pubbe “sabbaparisasādhāraṇā hi bhagavato dhammadesanā”tiādinā bhikkhūnaṃ eva āmantanakāraṇaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0302t0:10_6: idāni bhikkhū āmantetvā dhammadesanāya payojanaṃ dassetuṃ kimatthaṃ pana bhagavāti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0302t0:10_9: Dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāti hiyyo tato paradivasesu vā sutadhammaṃ pati manasā avekkhantā.
tika-s0302t0:10_10: Bhikkhū āmantetvā dhamme desiyamāne ādito paṭṭhāya desanaṃ sallakkhetuṃ sakkotīti imamevatthaṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ “te anāmantetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:11_10: “iti vā evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu ādiatthe “māgaṇḍiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā
tika-s0302t0:11_11: paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo”tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye, “iti kho,
tika-s0302t0:11_17: “atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā, ānanda,
tika-s0302t0:11_19: Kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya,
tika-s0302t0:11_23: sabbaṃ natthīti ayaṃ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu nidassane.
tika-s0302t0:11_27: Iminā nayena bhaddantetiādīsupi yathārahaṃ itisaddassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:12_0: Pubbe “bhagavā āmantesī”ti vuttattā bhagavato paccassosunti idha bhagavatoti sāmivacanaṃ āmantanameva
tika-s0302t0:12_1: sambandhīantaraṃ apekkhatīti iminā adhippāyena “bhagavato āmantanaṃ paṭiassosu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:12_3: Ettāvatā yaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nidānaṃ bhāsitanti sambandho. Etthāha –
tika-s0302t0:12_5: nanu bhagavatā bhāsitavacanasseva saṅgaho kātabboti? Vuccate –
tika-s0302t0:12_7: Kāladesadesakanimittaparisāpadesehi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā hoti asammosadhammā saddheyyā ca,
tika-s0302t0:12_11: kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā desādipucchāsu katāsu tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “evaṃ
tika-s0302t0:12_12: me suta”nti āyasmatā ānandena imassa suttassa nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:13_2: Na hi sammāsambuddhassa pubbaracanādīhi attho atthi,
tika-s0302t0:13_5: Na hi sabbaso khīṇāsavassa te sambhavantīti suvisuddhā cassa parānuggahappavatti,
tika-s0302t0:13_6: evaṃ desakasaṃkilesabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhisīlasampadādūsakānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ accantābhāvasaṃsūcakehi ñāṇasampadāpahānasampadābhibyañjanakehi
tika-s0302t0:13_8: tato eva ca antarāyikaniyyānikadhammesu sammohābhāvasiddhito pacchimavesārajjadvayasiddhīti bhagavato
tika-s0302t0:13_9: catuvesārajjasamannāgamo attahitaparahitapaṭipatti ca nidānavacanena pakāsitā hoti,
tika-s0302t0:13_10: tattha tattha sampattaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena dhammadesanādīpanato,
tika-s0302t0:14_1: Ñāṇakaruṇāpariggahitasabbakiriyassa hi bhagavato natthi niratthikā pavatti,
tika-s0302t0:14_3: tasmā paresaṃ eva atthāya pavattasabbakiriyassa sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ yathāpavattaṃ
tika-s0302t0:14_4: vuccamānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ sattānaṃ anusāsanaṭṭhena sāsanaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:14_6: Tayidaṃ satthucaritaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesehi saddhiṃ tattha tattha nidānavacanehi yathārahaṃ pakāsīyati,
tika-s0302t0:15_0: Apica satthu pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:15_1: tañcassa pamāṇabhāvadassanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena “bhagavā”ti ca iminā padena vibhāvitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:15_4: tato eva sabbasattuttamabhāvadīpanena ayamattho sabbathā pakāsito hotīti.
tika-s0302t0:16_1: Desanāpi hi desetabbassa sīlādiatthassa vineyyasantānesu nikkhipanato “nikkhepo”ti vuccatīti “suttanikkhepaṃ
tika-s0302t0:16_2: tāva vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hotī”ti sāmaññato bhagavato desanāya samuṭṭhānassa vibhāgaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0302t0:16_3: “etthāyaṃ desanā evaṃsamuṭṭhānā”ti desanāya samuṭṭhāne dassite suttassa sammadeva nidānaparijānanena
tika-s0302t0:16_5: Tato heṭṭhā “kasmā bhagavatā paṭiccasamuppādavaseneva desanā āraddhā”ti kenaci codanāya katāya “parajjhāsayoyaṃ
tika-s0302t0:16_7: Tattha yathā anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi suttantāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādipadhānanayena soḷasavidhataṃ nātivattanti,
tika-s0302t0:16_8: evaṃ attajjhāsayādisuttanikkhepavasena catubbidhabhāvanti āha “cattāro hi suttanikkhepā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:16_9: Ettha ca yathā attajjhāsayassa aṭṭhuppattiyā ca parajjhāsayapucchāhi saddhiṃ saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati “attajjhāsayo ca parajjhāsayo ca,
tika-s0302t0:16_11: attajjhāsayo ca parajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko ca,
tika-s0302t0:16_14: aṭṭhuppattiko ca parajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko cā”ti ajjhāsayapucchānusandhisambhavato,
tika-s0302t0:16_15: evaṃ yadipi aṭṭhuppattiyā ajjhāsayenapi saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati,
tika-s0302t0:16_16: attajjhāsayādīhi pana purato ṭhitehi aṭṭhuppattiyā saṃsaggo natthīti.
tika-s0302t0:16_17: Nayidha niravaseso vitthāranayo sambhavatīti “cattāro hi suttanikkhepā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:16_18: Tadantogadhattā vā sambhavantānaṃ sesanikkhepānaṃ mūlanikkhepavasena cattārova dassitā,
tika-s0302t0:17_15: Atha vā nikkhipīyati suttaṃ etenāti suttanikkhepo,
tika-s0302t0:17_17: Etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo.
tika-s0302t0:17_21: Tassa pucchāvasena pavattaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ vacanaṃ pucchāvasikaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:17_23: Tathā aṭṭhuppatti eva aṭṭhuppattikoti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:18_0: Apicettha paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇanirapekkhattā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ suttanikkhepabhāvo yutto
tika-s0302t0:18_2: Parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanāpavattihetubhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattitānaṃ kathaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ anavarodho,
tika-s0302t0:18_3: pucchāvasikaaṭṭhuppattikānaṃ vā parajjhāsayānurodhena pavattitānaṃ kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodhoti?
tika-s0302t0:18_5: Paresañhi abhinīhāraparipucchādivinimuttasseva suttadesanākāraṇuppādassa aṭṭhuppattibhāvena gahitattā parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:18_7: Paresaṃ pucchaṃ vinā ajjhāsayaṃ eva nimittaṃ katvā desito parajjhāsayo,
tika-s0302t0:18_10: Dasabalasuttantahārakoti dasabalavagge anupubbena nikkhittānaṃ suttānaṃ āvali,
tika-s0302t0:20_1: ñāṇena ugghaṭitamatte eva dhammaṃ jānātīti attho.
tika-s0302t0:20_5: Saha udāhaṭavelāyāti udāhāradhammassa uddese udāhaṭamatte eva.
tika-s0302t0:20_7: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena
tika-s0302t0:20_8: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo “ugghaṭitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0302t0:20_9: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ saṃkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo “vipañcitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0302t0:20_15: Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotīti anukkamena arahattappatti hoti.
tika-s0302t0:20_16: Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0302t0:20_17: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ puggalo byañjanapadameva paramaṃ katvā ṭhitattā “padaparamo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0302t0:21_1: Dvicarāti dve ekajjhāsayā hutvā ñāṇacariyādivasena vicarantā.
tika-s0302t0:21_5: “Paresaṃ ajjhāsayavasena bhagavā idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhī”ti vatvā te pana “pare”ti vuttapuggalā aparikammikā suparisodhitapubbabhāgapaṭipadā cāti duvidhā,
tika-s0302t0:21_6: tadubhayesu satthu paṭipattiṃ upamāmukhena pakāsento yathā hītiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:21_7: Rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti likhanavasena na uppādeti.
tika-s0302t0:22_2: Diṭṭhi cāti kammassakatādiṭṭhi ceva kammapathasammādiṭṭhi ca.
tika-s0302t0:22_3: Tividhenāti ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ajjhattabahiddhāti evaṃ visayabhāvato tippakārena.
tika-s0302t0:22_4: Yathāvuttadiṭṭhivisuddhiyā visesapaccayaṃ sīlaṃyeva bhāvanāya adhiṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ “sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāyā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:23_2: Paccayadhammānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ tassa tassa paccayuppannassa hetupaccayādibhāvo paccayākāro.
tika-s0302t0:23_3: So pana atthato avijjā evāti āha “paṭiccasamuppādanti paccayākāra”nti.
tika-s0302t0:24_2: nāmaparabhūto pana taṃ taṃ kattukammakaraṇādisādhanavisiṭṭhameva pabodheti, hi-
tika-s0302t0:25_2: tasmā sādhusaddassa kato atthuddhāro sādhukasaddassapi kato eva hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:25_3: Sādhu bhanteti yācāmahaṃ bhanteti ayamettha atthoti āha “āyācane”ti.
tika-s0302t0:25_4: Puna sādhu bhanteti evaṃ bhanteti ayamettha atthoti āha “sampaṭicchane”ti.
tika-s0302t0:25_5: Sādhu sādhūti aho ahoti ayamettha atthoti vuttaṃ “sampahaṃsane”ti.
tika-s0302t0:25_11: “Suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”ti hi vutte sādhukasaddena savanamanasikārānaṃ sakkaccakiriyā viya tadāṇāpanampi vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t0:26_9: Na hi yāthāvato suṇantassa saddato vipallāsaggāho hoti.
tika-s0302t0:26_11: Na hi sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ upadhārentassa atthavipallāsaggāho hoti.
tika-s0302t0:26_13: Dhāraṇūpaparikkhāsūti ettha upaparikkhaggahaṇeneva tulanatīraṇādike diṭṭhiyā ca suppaṭivedhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0302t0:26_23: Desanā nāma tassā manasā vavatthapitāya tantiyā desanā kathanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:26_25: Paṭivedho nāma tantiyā tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho.
tika-s0302t0:26_26: Yasmā cete dhammadesanāatthapaṭivedhā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāḷhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca,
tika-s0302t0:27_0: Ettha ca paṭivedhassa dukkarabhāvato dhammatthānaṃ desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya dukkhogāhatā,
tika-s0302t0:27_1: paṭivedhassa pana uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā tabbisayañāṇuppattiyā ca dukkarabhāvato dukkhogāhatā veditabbā.
tika-s0302t0:27_3: Tathā hi vibhaṅgasutte “desessāmī”ti vatvā puna “bhāsissāmī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:27_4: Tassa niddisanaṃ bhāsananti idhādhippetanti āha “vitthāratopi naṃ bhāsissāmīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:28_0: Sāḷikāyiva nigghosoti sāḷikāya ālāpo viya madhuro kaṇṇasukho pemanīyo.
tika-s0302t0:28_4: Evaṃ vutte ussāhajātāti evaṃ “suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha,
tika-s0302t0:28_5: bhāsissāmī”ti vutte “na kira satthā saṅkhepeneva desessati,
tika-s0302t0:29_0: Katamoti tassa padassa sāmaññato pucchābhāvo ñāyati,
tika-s0302t0:29_1: na visesatoti tassa pucchāvisesabhāvaṃ kathento “kathetukamyatāpucchā”ti vatvā teneva pasaṅgena mahāniddese
tika-s0302t0:29_2: āgatā sabbāpi pucchā atthuddhāranayena dasseti “pañcavidhā hi pucchā”tiādinā.
tika-s0302t0:29_8: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave”tiādipucchāya hi “kā tumhākaṃ anumatī”ti anumati pucchitā hoti.
tika-s0302t0:30_0: Lakkhaṇanti ñātuṃ pucchito yo koci sabhāvo.
tika-s0302t0:30_2: Adiṭṭhanti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena cakkhunā viya na diṭṭhataṃ.
tika-s0302t0:30_3: Atulitanti “ettakaṃ ida”nti tulanabhūtena ñāṇena na tulitataṃ.
tika-s0302t0:31_0: Pañcasu pucchāsu yā buddhānaṃ sabbato na santi,
tika-s0302t0:31_4: atha kasmā bhagavatā paṭiccasamuppādadesanāya saṅkhārādayo paccayuppannā kathitāti āha “ettha cā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t0:31_5: Paccayuppannampi katheti paccayuppannadassanena paccayadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvassa kathitabhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:31_7: “Sambhavantī”ti pāḷiyaṃ parato vuttaṃ kiriyāpadaṃ ānetvā yojeti,
tika-s0302t0:31_8: aññathā saṅkhārā kiṃ katāti vā karontīti vā na ñāyeyya.
tika-s0302t0:32_1: Accantameva saṅkhāre virajjati etenāti virāgo, maggo.
tika-s0302t0:32_3: Evaṃ nirodhānanti evaṃ anuppādanirodhena niruddhānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā.
tika-s0302t0:33_1: Tathābhūtā ca haṭṭhacittā nāma hontīti āha “tuṭṭhacittā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:33_4: Idha pana ubhayatthopi vaṭṭatīti āha “anumodiṃsu ceva sampaṭicchiṃsu cā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:36_3: “Visuddhimagge vuttā evā”ti vatvāpi tadekadesaṃ idha viniyogakkhamaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:36_5: Vitthāradesananti “vibhajissāmī”ti padassa atthassa dassanavasena pavattaṃ vibhaṅgadesanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:36_10: tato eva byatirekanayena vivaṭṭampi dassitameva hotīti punaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:37_0: Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānanti idaṃ kiñci pakārato anāmasitvā sabbepi satte sāmaññato byāpetvā gahaṇanti āha “saṅkhepato…pe…
tika-s0302t0:37_10: “alubbhitatta”ntiādīsu viya aññassa abhāvatāvisesanti evamādikaṃ anapekkhitvā dhammamattaṃ vā dīpanā sabhāvaniddeso.
tika-s0302t0:38_0: Kālātikkame kiccaniddesāti kalalakālato pabhuti purimarūpānaṃ jarāpattakkhaṇe uppajjamānāni pacchimarūpāni
tika-s0302t0:38_1: paripakkarūpānurūpāni pariṇatapariṇatāni uppajjantīti anukkamena supariṇatarūpānaṃ paripākakāle uppajjamānāni
tika-s0302t0:38_6: na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarāti udakādigatamaggesu tiṇarukkhasaṃbhaggatādayo viya paripākagatamaggasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0302t0:38_7: paripuṇṇarūpesu labbhamānā khaṇḍiccādayo jarāya gatamaggāicceva veditabbā,
tika-s0302t0:40_0: Aviññāyamānantarattā avīcijarā maṇiādīsu mandadasakādīsu ekekadasakesu ca khaṇe khaṇe jiṇṇavikārādīnaṃ duviññeyyattā.
tika-s0302t0:40_4: Tattha hi jarāvisesassa suviññeyyattā savīcijarā nāma.
tika-s0302t0:41_1: Ekacatupañcakkhandhāya cutiyā cavanameva cavanatāti āha “bhāvavacanena lakkhaṇanidassana”nti,
tika-s0302t0:41_4: Tena “bhedo”ti iminā khandhānaṃ bhijjamānatā bhedasamaṅgitā vuttāti dasseti.
tika-s0302t0:41_9: na koci viseso tiṭṭhatīti dassetuṃ “antaradhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:41_12: Santānassa accantasamucchedabhūtaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ maraṇaṃ samucchedamaraṇaṃ. Ādi-
tika-s0302t0:41_17: Cavanakālo eva vā anatikkamanīyattā visesena kāloti vuttoti tassa kiriyā atthato cutikkhandhānaṃ bhedapavattiyeva.
tika-s0302t0:41_18: “Maccu maraṇa”nti vā ettha samāsaṃ akatvā yo “maccū”ti vuccati bhedo,
tika-s0302t0:42_4: rūpakāyassa pana tattha atthitāmattaṃ gahetvā “ekavokāravasena kaḷevarassa nikkhepo”ti vutto.
tika-s0302t0:42_6: saddena “sesadvayavasena khandhānaṃ bhedo”ti imamatthaṃ dasseti sabbattheva khandhabhedasabbhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:42_12: Kaḷevaraṃ nikkhipīyati etenāti maraṇaṃ kaḷevarassa nikkhepo.
tika-s0302t0:43_0: Jāyanaṭṭhenātiādi āyatanavasena yonivasena ca dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā pariyādiyitvā jātiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:43_2: “Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ jāti sañjātī”ti pana kattari sāminiddesassa katattā ubhayatthāpi bhāvaniddeso.
tika-s0302t0:44_0: Tatra tatrāti ekacatuvokārabhavesu dvinnaṃ sesarūpadhātuyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ pañcannaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:44_1: kāmadhātuyaṃ vikalāvikalindriyānaṃ vasena sattannaṃ navannaṃ dasannaṃ puna dasannaṃ ekādasannañca āyatanānaṃ vasena saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:45_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “bhavatīti katvā bhavo”ti upapattibhavassa vakkhamānattā “kammaṃ phalavohārena bhavoti vutta”nti kathitaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:46_0: Upādiyanti sattā daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhanti etena kilesakāmena.
tika-s0302t0:46_2: atha kho kattusādhanampi labbhatīti vuttaṃ “sayaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:47_0: Sassato attāti idaṃ purimadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyamānaṃ uttaradiṭṭhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:47_1: Yathā esā diṭṭhi daḷhīkaraṇavasena purimaṃ uttarā upādiyati,
tika-s0302t0:47_3: Attaggahaṇaṃ pana “attavādupādāna”nti idaṃ na diṭṭhupādānadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:47_4: Loko cāti attaggahaṇavinimuttaggahaṇaṃ diṭṭhupādānabhūtaṃ idha purimadiṭṭhiuttaradiṭṭhivacanehi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:48_0: Yena micchābhinivesena gosīlagovatādiṃ samādiyati ceva anutiṭṭhati ca,
tika-s0302t0:49_0: Attavādupādānanti “attā”ti vādassa paññāpanassa gahaṇassa kāraṇabhūtā diṭṭhīti attho.
tika-s0302t0:50_0: Cakkhudvārādīsu pavattāyāti idaṃ taṇhāya rūpataṇhādibhāvassa kāraṇavacanaṃ chadvārārammaṇikadhammānaṃ paṭiniyatārammaṇattā.
tika-s0302t0:50_2: Sabhāveneva uṭṭhātuṃ asakkontassa veḷu viya nissayo ahutvā olumbhakabhāvena bhāvo upādānassa paccayabhāvato ārammaṇampi taṃsadisaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:50_6: Evaṃ assādentīti sassatadiṭṭhiyā sahajātanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatādipaccayabhūtāya saṃsaṭṭhattā niccadhuvasassatābhinivesamukhena assādentī.
tika-s0302t0:50_8: Bhavati tiṭṭhati sabbakālanti hi bhavadiṭṭhi bhavo uttarapadalopena,
tika-s0302t0:50_10: Iminā nayena vibhavataṇhāti ettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:50_11: Vibhavati ucchijjati vinassatīti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi vibhavo uttarapadalopena.
tika-s0302t0:50_12: Evaṃ tāni aṭṭhārasāti yā cha kāmataṇhā,
tika-s0302t0:50_22: Idāni aparenapi pakārena aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni dassetuṃ “ajjhattikassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:50_26: Asmīti hotīti yadetaṃ ajjhattikaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena samudāyaggāhato asmīti gāho hoti,
tika-s0302t0:50_29: Itthamasmīti hotīti khattiyādīsu “idaṃpakāro aha”nti evaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena hotīti attho.
tika-s0302t0:51_15: Upanidhāya gahaṇampi duvidhaṃ samato asamato vāti taṃ dassetuṃ “evamasmi,
tika-s0302t0:51_17: Tattha evamasmīti idaṃ samato upanidhāya gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:51_21: yathāyaṃ khattiyo tato aññathā ahaṃ hīno vā adhiko vāti attho.
tika-s0302t0:51_30: Ito parāni siyantiādīni cattāri saṃsayaparivitakkavasena vuttāni,
tika-s0302t0:51_32: Apāhaṃ siyantiādīni pana cattāri “api nāmāhaṃ bhaveyya”nti evaṃ patthanākappanavasena vuttāni,
tika-s0302t0:54_0: Ete hi sassatucchedavasena vuttā dve diṭṭhisīsā nāma, “asmi,
tika-s0302t0:54_2: apāhaṃ siya”nti ete cattāro suddhasīsā nāma,
tika-s0302t0:54_3: “itthamasmī”tiādayo tayo tayoti dvādasa sīsamūlakā nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:54_4: Idha pāḷiyaṃ rūpārammaṇādivasena taṇhā āgatāti āha “ajjhattikarūpādinissitānī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:54_6: Iminā asmīti iminā abhisekasenāpaccādinā “khattiyo aha”nti mūlabhāvato “asmī”ti hoti.
tika-s0302t0:54_8: Saṅgaheti taṇhāya yathāvuttavibhāgassa saṃkhipanavasena saṅgaṇhane kariyamāne. “Chayime,
tika-s0302t0:55_0: Yasmā cakkhudvārādīsu ekekasmiṃ dvāre uppajjanakaviññāṇāni viya anekā eva vedanā,
tika-s0302t0:55_1: tasmā tā rāsivasena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “cha vedanākāyā”ti vuttanti āha “vedanāsamūhā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:55_3: tā kucchinā dhārentiyo viya posentiyo viya ca hontīti tāsaṃ mātusadisatā vuttā.
tika-s0302t0:55_5: Ayanti ayaṃ vedanā “cakkhusamphassajā vedanā”tiādinā sādhāraṇato vuttā.
tika-s0302t0:55_8: Evaṃ vibhaṅge āgatanayena sādhāraṇato vatvāpi idhādhippetavedanameva dassetuṃ “vipākavasena panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:56_0: Namanalakkhaṇanti ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ hutvā namanasabhāvaṃ tena vinā appavattanato.
tika-s0302t0:56_4: Nanu tattha jīvitacittaṭṭhitiyo ca santīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:56_5: tāsaṃ pana kiccaṃ na tathā pākaṭaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:56_6: yathā cetanādīnanti te evettha pāḷiyaṃ uddhaṭā.
tika-s0302t0:56_9: Añño vinicchayanayoti “vacanatthato kalāpato”tiādinā lakkhaṇādinicchayato añño vinicchayanayo.
tika-s0302t0:56_12: Tattha vuttepi “catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānī”ti atidesavasena vuttattā “rūpakkhandhaniddese vutto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:56_14: Bhūtāni hi paṭicca uppajjamānaṃ upādārūpaṃ “tāni gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ avissajjanato.
tika-s0302t0:56_16: Pubbakālakiriyā nāma ekaṃsato aparakālakiriyāpekkhāti pāṭhasesena atthaṃ vadati.
tika-s0302t0:56_17: Vibhattivipallāsena vinā eva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “samūhatthe vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:56_18: Samūhasambandhe sāminiddesena samūhattho dīpitoti taṃ dassento āha “samūhaṃ upādāyā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:56_21: “yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāyā”ti vā paṭṭhāne āgatattā hadayavatthumpi gahetvā jātirūpabhāvena upacayasantatiyo ekato katvā “tevīsatividha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:57_2: “Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ettha sabbalokiyavipākaviññāṇassa gahetabbattā “tebhūmakavipākacittassetaṃ adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:58_5: Evaṃ copanaṃ na bhaveyyāti dassetuṃ “raho nisīditvā cintentassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:58_6: Ekūnatiṃsāti ettha abhiññācetanāvinimuttā eva ekūnatiṃsa cetanā veditabbā tassā vipākaviññāṇassa paccayattābhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:59_0: Dukkheti ekampi idaṃ bhummavacanaṃ saṃsilesananissayavisayabyāpanavasena attānaṃ bhinditvā viniyogaṃ gacchatīti “catūhi kāraṇehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:59_1: Ekopi hi vibhattiniddeso anekadhā viniyogaṃ gacchati yathā taddhitatthe uttarapadasamāhāreti.
tika-s0302t0:60_0: Sahajātassa aññāṇassa samudayasaccaṃ vatthu hoti nissayapaccayabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “vatthuto”ti.
tika-s0302t0:60_4: Paṭicchādanaṃ dukkhasacce vuttanayameva ekeneva kāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ asambhavato,
tika-s0302t0:60_5: kiṃ pana etaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇanti āha “paṭicchādanato”ti.
tika-s0302t0:60_7: Tadārabbhāti taṃ ārabbha taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
tika-s0302t0:60_10: Duddasanti saṇhasukhumadhammattā sabhāveneva gambhīratāya duddasaṃ duviññeyyaṃ duravaggāhaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:60_13: Na pavattati ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ na visahati.
tika-s0302t0:60_16: ayaṃ samudayo”ti yāthāvato sabhāvalakkhaṇassa duddasattā duviññeyyattā purimadvayaṃ gambhīraṃ.
tika-s0302t0:60_18: Vipallāsaggāhavasena pavattatīti subhādiviparītaggāhānaṃ paccayabhāvavasena aññāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0302t0:61_0: Idāni “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādīsu pakārantarenapi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:61_1: Tattha dukkheti ettāvatāti “aññāṇanti vuccamānāya avijjāya dukkhe”ti ettakena.
tika-s0302t0:61_6: visesato niddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti katvā sabbattheva tathā avisiṭṭhasabhāvadassanaṃ idanti dassetuṃ “avisesato panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:62_0: Khaṇikanirodhassa idha anadhippetattā ayujjamānattā virāgaggahaṇato ca avijjādīnaṃ paṭipakkhavasena paṭibāhanaṃ idha “nirodho”ti adhippeto,
tika-s0302t0:62_1: so ca nesaṃ sabbaso anuppajjanamevāti āha “nirodho hotīti anuppādo hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:62_3: saṅkhārā nirujjhanti etthāti saṅkhāranirodho”ti evaṃ sabbehi etehi nirodhapadehi nibbānassa desitattā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0302t0:62_6: “Dvādasahī”ti idaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ “anulomato dvādasahi padehi vaṭṭaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:65_9: “Idaṃ me puññaṃ nibbānādhigamāya paccayo hotū”ti evaṃ nibbānaṃ patthetvā pavattitaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:65_13: Yadaggena vā paṭipajjanato arahattaṃ pattoti vuccati,
tika-s0302t0:65_14: tadaggena tadāvahā paṭipadāpi pattāti vuccatīti “appatvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:65_17: Paṭipadā pucchitāti etena paṭipadā desetuṃ āraddhāti ayampi attho saṅgahito yathāraddhassa atthassa kathetukamyatāpucchāya idhāgatattā.
tika-s0302t0:65_18: Anulomapaṭiccasamuppādadesanāyampettha byatirekamukhena avijjādinirodhā pana vijjāya sati hoti saṅkhārānaṃ asambhavoti vuttaṃ “nibbānaṃ bhājita”nti.
tika-s0302t0:65_29: Tasmā pattabbaphalena nibbānena taṃsampāpakahetubhūtāya paṭipadāya dassitattāti attho.
tika-s0302t0:65_31: Ayaṃ vuccatīti evaṃ nibbānaphalā ayaṃ “sammāpaṭipadā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0302t0:65_32: Asesavirāgā asesanirodhāti samucchedappahānavasena avijjāya asesavirajjanato asesanirujjhanato ca.
tika-s0302t0:65_39: Evañhi satīti evaṃ padabhājanassa nibbānassa padatthe sati.
tika-s0302t0:65_40: Sānubhāvā paṭipadā vibhattā hotīti avijjāya asesanirodhahetupaṭipadā tattha sātisayasāmatthiyasamāyogato sānubhāvā vibhattā hoti.
tika-s0302t0:69_1: taṃ akāraṇaṃ aññesampi mahāsattānaṃ carimabhave animisalocanattāti codanaṃ sandhāya “ettha cā”tiādiṃ
tika-s0302t0:69_2: vatvā tato pana aññameva kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:70_0: Puññussayasaṅkhāto bhago assa atisayena atthīti bhagavāti “bhāgyasampannassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:70_2: ñāyena kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotīti āha “nayena hetunā”ti. Saṃ-
tika-s0302t0:70_5: sāmaṃ bujjhi etenāti sambodho vuccati maggañāṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:70_9: Bujjhanakasattoti ettha mahābodhiyānapaṭipadāya bujjhatīti bodhi ca so sattavisesayogato satto cāti bodhisatto.
tika-s0302t0:70_10: Patthayamāno pavattatīti “kudāssu nāma mahantaṃ bodhiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti sañjātacchando paṭipajjati.
tika-s0302t0:70_13: “jāyati mīyatī”ti pana vatvā “cavati upapajjatī”ti vacanaṃ na ekabhavapariyāpannānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:70_14: atha kho nānābhavapariyāpannānaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇanti dassento āha “idaṃ…pe…
tika-s0302t0:70_16: Tassa nissaraṇanti tassa jarāmaraṇassa nissaraṇanti vuccati.
tika-s0302t0:71_0: Upāyamanasikārenāti upāyena vidhinā ñāyena manasikārena pathena manasikārassa pavattanato.
tika-s0302t0:71_1: Samāyogo ahosīti yāthāvato paṭivijjhanavasena samāgamo ahosi.
tika-s0302t0:71_2: Yoniso manasikārāti hetumhi nissakkavacananti tassa “yoniso manasikārenā”ti hetumhi karaṇavacanena āha.
tika-s0302t0:71_3: Jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇanti “kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0302t0:71_4: kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti jarāmaraṇe kāraṇaṃ pariggaṇhantassa bodhisattassa “yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti,
tika-s0302t0:71_6: taṃ tassa kāraṇa”nti evaṃ abyabhicārajātikāraṇapariggaṇhanena “jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0302t0:71_7: jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti yā jarāmaraṇassa kāraṇapariggāhikā paññā uppajji,
tika-s0302t0:71_8: tāya uppajjantiyā cassa abhisamayo paṭivedho ahosīti attho.
tika-s0302t0:72_4: Idha avijjāya samudayassa āgatattā “ekādasasu ṭhānesū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:72_5: Samudayaṃ sampiṇḍetvāti saṅkhārādīnaṃ samudayaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0302t0:72_6: Anekavārañhi samudayadassanavasena ñāṇassa pavattattā “samudayo samudayo”ti āmeḍitavacanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:72_7: Atha vā “evaṃ samudayo hotī”ti idaṃ na kevalaṃ nibbattidassanaparaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:72_8: atha kho paṭiccasamuppādasaddo viya paṭiccasamuppādamukhena idha samudayasaddo nibbattimukhena paccayattaṃ vadati.
tika-s0302t0:72_9: Viññāṇādayo ca yāvanto idha paccayadhammā niddiṭṭhā,
tika-s0302t0:72_10: te sāmaññarūpena byāpanicchāvasena gaṇhanto “samudayo samudayo”ti avoca.
tika-s0302t0:72_12: Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhūti samudayassa paccakkhato dassanabhāvo cakkhu.
tika-s0302t0:72_14: Pajānanaṭṭhenāti “avijjāsaṅkhārāditaṃtaṃpaccayadhammapavattiyā etassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo”ti pakārato vā jānanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0302t0:72_15: Paṭivedhanaṭṭhenāti “ayaṃ avijjādi paccayadhammo imassa saṅkhārādikassa paccayabhāvato samudayo”ti paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0302t0:72_16: Obhāsanaṭṭhenāti samudayabhāvapaṭicchādakassa mohandhakārassa kilesandhakārassa vidhamanavasena avabhāsanavasena.
tika-s0302t0:72_19: So hi “kissa nirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho”ti nirodhakittanavasena āgato.
tika-s0302t0:75_1: Na evaṃ yojetvāti “sikhissapī”tiādinā samuccayavasena evaṃ na yojetvā.
tika-s0302t0:75_3: Ekāsane adesitattāti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “nānāṭhānesu hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:75_4: Yadipi tāni visuṃ visuṃ vuttabhāvena desitāni,
tika-s0302t0:75_7: Na hi mahābodhisattānaṃ pacchimabhave paropadesena payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-s0302t0:75_10: Gacchantīti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu patiṭṭhitacittā satta bojjhaṅge yāthāvato bhāvetvā sammāsambodhiyā abhisambujjhanavasena pavattantīti attho.
tika-s0302t0:80_4: Bhūtā nāma yasmā tato paṭṭhāya loke jātavohāro paṭisandhiggahaṇato pana paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchito nikkhanto,
tika-s0302t0:80_10: Paṭhamacittapaṭhamairiyāpathakkhaṇesu hi te sambhavaṃ uppattiṃ esanti upagacchanti nāma,
tika-s0302t0:80_11: na tāva bhūtā upapattiyā na suppatiṭṭhitattā,
tika-s0302t0:80_13: Na puna bhavissantīti avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0302t0:80_16: saddo cettha sampiṇḍanattho “agginā vā udakena vā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0302t0:81_0: Yathāsakaṃ paccayabhāvena attabhāvassa paṭhapanamevettha āhārehi kātabbaanuggaho hotīti adhippāyenāha “vacanabhedo…pe…
tika-s0302t0:81_3: Yathā “vassasataṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti vutte anuppabandhavasena pavattatīti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0302t0:81_6: Anuppabandhadhammuppattiyā sattasantāno anuggahito nāma hotīti āha “anuppannānaṃ uppādāyā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:82_0: Vatthugatā ojā vatthu viya tena saddhiṃ ajjhoharitabbataṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ “ajjhoharitabbako āhāro”ti,
tika-s0302t0:82_1: nibbattitaojaṃ pana sandhāya “kabaḷīkāro āhāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āharatī”ti vakkhati.
tika-s0302t0:82_2: Oḷārikatā appojatāya na vatthuno thūlatāya kathinatāya vā,
tika-s0302t0:82_3: tasmā yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ parittā ojā hoti,
tika-s0302t0:82_14: atha kho sukhumoicceva niṭṭhaṃ patto tato paramasukhumassa abhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:83_1: sā cassa appojamahojatāhi veditabbāti dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:83_4: Na pana sakkoti pāletunti sarīraṃ yāpetuṃ nappahoti nirojattā.
tika-s0302t0:83_5: Na sakkoti parissayaṃ vinodetuṃ āmāsayassa apūraṇato.
tika-s0302t0:84_2: na aññena kāraṇenāti āha “desanānayo eva cesā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t0:84_3: Manaso sañcetanā na sattassāti dassanatthaṃ manogahaṇaṃ yathā “cittassa ṭhiti,
tika-s0302t0:84_6: Ekarāsiṃ katvāti ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vibhāgaṃ akatvā,
tika-s0302t0:84_8: Tattha labbhamānaṃ upādiṇṇakādivibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “kabaḷīkāro āhāro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:84_9: Āhāratthaṃ na sādhentīti tādisassa āhārassa anāharaṇato.
tika-s0302t0:84_12: Idaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ na ruccati tadā upādiṇṇakarūpasseva abhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:84_18: Kammajaojaṃ pana paṭicca uppannaojā akammajattā anupādiṇṇaāhārotveva veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:84_20: Lokuttarā phassādayo kathanti āha “lokuttarā pana ruḷhīvasena kathitā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:84_22: tasmā vipākānaṃ upādiṇṇapariyāyo natthevāti anupādiṇṇapariyāyopi ruḷhīvasena vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:85_0: Pubbe “āhārāti paccayā”ti vuttattā yadi paccayaṭṭho āhāraṭṭhotiādinā codeti,
tika-s0302t0:85_1: atha kasmā ime eva cattāro vuttāti atha kasmā cattārova vuttā.
tika-s0302t0:85_3: Visesappaccayattāti etena yathā aññe paccayadhammā attano paccayuppannassa paccayāva honti,
tika-s0302t0:85_4: ime pana tathā ca hoti aññathā cāti samānepi paccayatte atirekapaccayā honti,
tika-s0302t0:85_6: Idāni taṃ atirekapaccayataṃ dassetuṃ “visesapaccayo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:85_8: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “rūpārūpānaṃ upathambhakattena upakārakā cattāro āhārā āhārapaccayo”ti.
tika-s0302t0:85_9: Upathambhakattañhi satīpi janakatte arūpīnaṃ āhārānaṃ āhārajarūpasamuṭṭhānakarūpāhārassa ca hoti,
tika-s0302t0:85_10: asati pana upathambhakatte āhārānaṃ janakattaṃ natthīti upathambhakattaṃ padhānaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:85_11: Janayamānopi hi āhāro avicchedavasena upathambhayamāno eva janetīti upathambhakabhāvo eva āhārabhāvo.
tika-s0302t0:85_16: “Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti pana vacanato nāmarūpassa viññāṇaṃ visesapaccayo.
tika-s0302t0:85_17: Na hi okkantaviññāṇābhāve nāmarūpassa atthi sambhavo.
tika-s0302t0:85_20: api nu kho nāmarūpaṃ mātukucchismiṃ samuccissathā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t0:86_1: visesapaccayattā pana imeva āhārāti vuttāti taṃ nesaṃ visesapaccayataṃ avibhāgato dassetvā idāni vibhāgato dassetuṃ “ko panetthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:86_3: tattakenāpi abbhantarassa āhārassa paccayo hoti eva.
tika-s0302t0:86_8: tesaṃ vasena sabbappakāropi phassāhāro yathārahaṃ tisso vedanā āharati,
tika-s0302t0:87_0: Sabbathāpīti idhāpi phassāhāre vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:87_4: paccayo hontoyeva āhārapaccayatāya taṃ āhāreti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:87_5: sahajātarūpesu pana vatthuno sampayuttapaccayaṃ ṭhapetvā vippayuttapaccayena,
tika-s0302t0:87_6: sesarūpānaṃ aññamaññapaccayañca ṭhapetvā itaresaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0302t0:87_7: Tānīti napuṃsakaniddeso anapuṃsakānampi napuṃsakehi saha vacanato.
tika-s0302t0:87_11: Yathā tassa tassa phalassa visesato paccayatāya etesaṃ āhārattho,
tika-s0302t0:87_13: Tattha taṃsampayuttataṃsamuṭṭhānadhammānanti tehi phassādīhi sampayuttadhammānañceva taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpadhammānañca.
tika-s0302t0:88_0: Upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādhetīti upatthambhento eva rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0302t0:88_4: Vijānantamevāti upapattiparikappanavasena vijānantameva āhārakiccaṃ sādhetīti yojanā.
tika-s0302t0:88_5: Sabbattha āhārakiccasādhanañca tesaṃ vedanādiuppattihetutāya attabhāvassa pavattanameva.
tika-s0302t0:88_7: nanu kammajādirūpaṃ kammādināva pavattatīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kammajanitopī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t0:89_0: Upādiṇṇarūpasantatiyā upatthambhaneneva utucittajarūpasantatīnampi upatthambhanasiddhi hotīti “dvinnaṃ rūpasantatīna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:89_4: Ārammaṇampi hi vasati ettha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tadārammaṇā dhammāti vatthūti vuccati.
tika-s0302t0:89_6: Na hi dhammānaṃ sabhāvena vinā pavatti atthi,
tika-s0302t0:89_7: vedanāpavattiyā vinā sattānaṃ sandhāvanatā natthīti āha “sukhādi…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:89_9: tassāpi vā kāraṇabhūtavedanāpavattivaseneva ṭhitiyā hetuno abyāpitattā,
tika-s0302t0:89_12: Tato eva viññāṇaṃ vijānantamevāti upapattiparikappanavasena vijānantamevāti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0302t0:90_7: Upagamanaṃ visayindriyaviññāṇesu visayaviññāṇesu ca saṅgativasena pavatti,
tika-s0302t0:90_14: Abhinipāto tattha tattha bhave paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena viññāṇassa nibbatti.
tika-s0302t0:90_15: So bhavūpapattihetukānaṃ sabbesaṃ anatthānaṃ mūlakāraṇatāya “bhaya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:90_16: Idāni nikantiādīnaṃ sappaṭibhayataṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “kiṃ kāraṇā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:91_2: Kāyasamphassavasena hi sattānaṃ phoṭṭhabbataṇhā pavattatīti dassetuṃ phassāhārādīnavadassane phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0302t0:91_5: Sati hi phassāhāre sattānaṃ phassārammaṇe assādo, nāsati,
tika-s0302t0:92_4: aññañca sabbabhayaṃ āgatameva hoti bhayādhiṭṭhānassa attabhāvassa nipphādanato.
tika-s0302t0:93_1: Paṭhamābhinibbatti hi sattānaṃ tattha tattha aṅgārakāsusadise bhave abhinipātasadisī.
tika-s0302t0:93_3: Sabbabhayānaṃ abhinipātoyeva bhayaṃ bhāyati etasmāti katvā.
tika-s0302t0:95_0: Paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvāti paṭisandhikkhaṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā.
tika-s0302t0:95_3: Paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ sattānaṃ sattasantativasenāti paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ sabhāvakānaṃ cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ
tika-s0302t0:95_4: jivhā kāyo bhāvo vatthūti imesaṃ sattannaṃ santatīnaṃ vasena.
tika-s0302t0:96_2: Vaṭṭaṃ dassetvāti sarūpato nayato ca sakalameva vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā.
tika-s0302t0:96_3: Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato vibhāvetuṃ “imasmiñca pana ṭhāne”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:96_4: Atītābhimukhaṃ desanaṃ katvāti paccuppannabhavato paṭṭhāya atītadhammābhimukhaṃ tabbisayaṃ desanaṃ katvā tathākāraṇena.
tika-s0302t0:96_5: Atītena vaṭṭaṃ dassetīti atītabhavena kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0302t0:96_7: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “atītena vaṭṭaṃ dassetī”ti vuttanti?
tika-s0302t0:96_11: Na hi kammunā vinā taṇhā bhavanetti yujjati.
tika-s0302t0:97_2: Tassattabhāvassa janakaṃ kammanti tassa yathāvuttassa attabhāvassa janakaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:97_3: Tato parampi attabhāvaṃ āyūhitaṃ kammaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:97_4: Avijjā ca nāma taṇhā viya kammattāti kammasseva gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:97_5: Dvīsu ṭhānesūti āhāraggahaṇena vedanādiggahaṇenāti dvīsu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0302t0:97_7: Puna dvīsūti taṇhāggahaṇe avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇeti dvīsu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0302t0:97_8: Tassa janakanti paccuppannassa ceva atītassa ca attabhāvassa janakaṃ kammaṃ vuttanti yojanā.
tika-s0302t0:97_9: Kammaggahaṇena cettha yattha taṃ kammaṃ āyūhitaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:97_10: sā atītā jāti atthato dassitā hoti.
tika-s0302t0:97_12: Saṅkhepenāti saṅkhepena hetupañcakaphalapañcakaggahaṇampi hi saṅkhepo eva hetuphalabhāvena saṅgahetabbadhammānaṃ anekavidhattā.
tika-s0302t0:98_1: evaṃ sati sappadesā paṭiccasamuppādadhammadesanā hotīti dassento “tatrāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:98_2: Tena hi yadipi sarūpato anāgatena vaṭṭaṃ idha na dassitaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:98_3: nayato pana tassapi dassitattā nippadesā eva paṭiccasamuppādadesanāti dasseti.
tika-s0302t0:98_4: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:99_1: evaṃ attabhāvasandhārakānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ mūlabhūtā taṇhāti vuttaṃ “gīvāya diṭṭhakālo”ti.
tika-s0302t0:99_6: Idha desanāya paccayā avijjāsaṅkhārā veditabbāti “naṅguṭṭhamūlassa diṭṭhakālo viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:99_7: Tathā hi pariyosāne “naṅguṭṭhamūlaṃ passeyyā”ti upamādassanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0302t0:99_9: Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatassāpi paccayavaṭṭassa hetuvasena phalavasena vā paripuṇṇabhāvassa mukhamattadassanīyattā ādito phalahetusandhi,
tika-s0302t0:99_11: antepi phalahetusandhīti evaṃ tisandhikattā catusaṅkhepameva vaṭṭaṃ dassitanti.
tika-s0302t0:102_2: āhārā”ti evaṃ cattāro āhāre sarūpato dassetvā “ime kho bhikkhave…pe…
tika-s0302t0:102_4: Desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi catuāhāravibhāgadīpakaṃ desanaṃ uddesavaseneva niṭṭhāpesi,
tika-s0302t0:102_7: Varagandhavāsitanti sabhāvasiddhena candanagandhena ceva tadaññanānāgandhena ca paribhāvitattā varagandhavāsitaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:102_9: Desanānusandhiṃ ghaṭentoti yathādesitāya desanāya anusandhiṃ ghaṭento,
tika-s0302t0:102_12: Viññāṇāhāraṃ āhāretīti tassa āhāraṇakiriyāya vuttapucchāya taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppāṭento “yo etaṃ…pe…
tika-s0302t0:103_0: Viññāṇāhāre nāma icchite tassa upabhuñjakenapi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:103_1: so “ko nu kho”ti ayaṃ pucchāya adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:103_3: So hi utusamayassa mattakasamayattā tathā vutto.
tika-s0302t0:103_5: Gijjhapotakā viya āhārasañcetanāya tāni kacchapaṇḍāni manosañcetanāhārena yāpentīti ayaṃ tassa therassa laddhi.
tika-s0302t0:103_6: Kiñcāpi ayaṃ laddhīti phassamanosañcetanāhāresu kiñcāpi therassa yuttā ayuttā vā ayaṃ laddhi.
tika-s0302t0:103_8: viññāṇāhāraṃ āhāretī”ti imaṃ pañhaṃ etāya yathāvuttāya laddhiyā na pana pucchati,
tika-s0302t0:103_11: Na niggahetabbo ummattakasadisattā adhippāyaṃ ajānitvā pucchāya katattā.
tika-s0302t0:104_0: Tasmiṃ mayā evaṃ vutteti tasmiṃ vacane mayā “āhāretī”ti evaṃ vutte sati.
tika-s0302t0:104_2: viññāṇāhāraṃ āhāretī”ti ayaṃ pañho yutto bhaveyya.
tika-s0302t0:104_3: Evaṃ pucchite pañheti sattupaladdhiṃ anādāya “katamassa dhammassa paccayo”ti evaṃ dhammapavattavaseneva pañhe pucchite.
tika-s0302t0:104_4: Teneva viññāṇenāti teneva paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha uppannaṃ nāmañca rūpañca atītabhave diṭṭhigatikassa
tika-s0302t0:104_6: Nāmarūpe jāte satīti nāmarūpe nibbatte tappaccayabhūtaṃ bhinditvā saḷāyatanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t0:105_3: niyamato cattāri bhūtāni cha vatthūni jīvitindriyaṃ āhāro ca.
tika-s0302t0:105_4: Tattha vipākanāmaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe hadayavatthuno sahāyo hutvā chaṭṭhassa manāyatanassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttavipākaatthiavigatapaccayehi
tika-s0302t0:105_6: Kiñci panettha hetupaccayena kiñci āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ ukkaṃsāvakaṃso veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:105_7: Itaresaṃ pana pañcāyatanānaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ sahāyo hutvā sahajātanissayavipākavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena chadhā paccayo hoti.
tika-s0302t0:105_8: Kiñci panettha hetupaccayena kiñci āhārapaccayenāti sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:105_9: Pavatte vipākanāmaṃ vipākassa chaṭṭhāyatanassa vuttanayena sattadhā paccayo hoti,
tika-s0302t0:105_10: avipākaṃ pana avipākassa chaṭṭhassa tato vipākapaccayaṃ apanetvā paccayo hoti.
tika-s0302t0:105_11: Cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pana paccuppannaṃ cakkhupasādādivatthukampi itarampi vipākanāmaṃ pacchājātavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi catudhā paccayo hoti,
tika-s0302t0:105_13: Rūpato pana vatthurūpaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ chaṭṭhassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi chadhā paccayo hoti.
tika-s0302t0:105_14: Cattāri pana bhūtāni cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayehi catudhā paccayo hoti.
tika-s0302t0:105_15: Rūpajīvitaṃ atthiavigatindriyavasena tidhā paccayo hotīti ayañhettha saṅkhepo,
tika-s0302t0:106_0: Pañhassa okāsaṃ dentoti “ko nu kho, bhante,
tika-s0302t0:106_5: So pana ucchedavādinopi yāva na ucchijjati,
tika-s0302t0:106_10: Na tassa dāni nipphādetabbaṃ kiñci atthīti laddhi.
tika-s0302t0:106_11: Idappaccayā idanti imasmā viññāṇāhārapaccayā idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:106_12: Puna idappaccayā idanti imasmā nāmarūpapaccayā idaṃ saḷāyatananti evaṃ bahūsu ṭhānesu bhagavatā kathitattā
tika-s0302t0:106_13: yathā paccayato nibbattaṃ saṅkhāramattamidanti saññattiṃ upagato.
tika-s0302t0:106_15: Ekābaddhaṃ katvāti yathā pucchāya avasaro na hoti,
tika-s0302t0:106_17: Desanāruḷhanti yato saḷāyatanapadato paṭṭhāya “saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso”tiādinā desanā paṭiccasamuppādavīthiṃ āruḷhameva.
tika-s0302t0:106_22: Viññāṇāhāro āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyāti evaṃ purimabhavato āyatibhavassa paccayavasena mūlakāraṇavasena
tika-s0302t0:106_23: ca desitattā “viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ antare eko sandhī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:106_24: Tadaminā viññāṇaggahaṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassāpi gahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:109_1: Ye paccayasamavāye tenattabhāvena saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā,
tika-s0302t0:109_2: te bāhirakaliṅge ṭhitāpi teneva tattha samatthatāyogena bhāvinaṃ samitabāhitapāpataṃ apekkhitvā samaṇasammatāyeva
tika-s0302t0:109_3: brāhmaṇasammatāyevāti te nivattetuṃ “saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:109_5: Aññathā kathaṃ bāhirakāpi jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhanti na jānanti.
tika-s0302t0:109_14: tasmā sataṇhā eva jātijarāmaraṇassa samudayoti bhūtakathanametaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:109_19: Yena samannāgatattā puggalo paramatthato samaṇo brāhmaṇoti vuccati,
tika-s0302t0:109_25: tassa vasena abhinnopi veneyyajjhāsayato dvidhā katvā vattuṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ “ubhayatthāpī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:109_26: Ekādasasu ṭhānesu cattāri saccāni kathesi avijjāsamudayassa anuddhaṭattā.
tika-s0302t0:112_1: Ime dhamme katame dhammeti ca ettha iti-
tika-s0302t0:112_3: Tena “imesaṃ dhammānaṃ katamesaṃ dhammāna”nti imesaṃ padānaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0302t0:112_4: Etāni hi padāni jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvena vuttāni imissā desanāya papañcabhūtānīti āha “ettakaṃ papañcaṃ katvā kathitaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:112_7: Iminā tāneva jarāmaraṇādīni gahetvā puggalajjhāsayavasena ādito “ime dhamme”tiādinā sabbapadasādhāraṇato desanā āraddhā.
tika-s0302t0:115_1: Yasmā idha jānantāpi “sammādiṭṭhī”ti vadanti ajānantāpi bāhirakāpi sāsanikāpi anussavādivasenapi attapaccakkhenapi,
tika-s0302t0:115_2: tasmā taṃ bahūnaṃ vacanaṃ upādāya āmeḍitavasena “sammādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti, bhante,
tika-s0302t0:115_7: sā panāyaṃ evaṃ vuccamānā atthañca lakkhaṇañca upādāya kittāvatā nu kho, bhante,
tika-s0302t0:115_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sammādiṭṭhī”ti vacane yasmā viññū eva pamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:115_16: Yāya diṭṭhiyā “sabboyaṃ loko atthi vijjati sabbakālaṃ upalabbhatī”ti diṭṭhigatiko gaṇhāti,
tika-s0302t0:115_18: sā eva sadā sabbakālaṃ loko atthīti pavattagāhatāya sassato,
tika-s0302t0:115_20: Yāya diṭṭhiyā “sabboyaṃ loko natthi na hoti ucchijjatī”ti diṭṭhigatiko gaṇhāti,
tika-s0302t0:115_29: Yā natthīti yā ucchedadiṭṭhi tattha tattheva sattānaṃ ucchijjanato vinassanato koci ṭhito nāma satto dhammo vā natthīti saṅkhāraloke uppajjeyya.
tika-s0302t0:115_31: Sā na hotīti kammāvijjātaṇhādibhedaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca saṅkhāralokassa samudayanibbattiṃ sammappaññāya passato,
tika-s0302t0:115_36: Yā atthīti hetuphalasambandhena pavattamānassa santānānupacchedassa ekattaggahaṇena saṅkhāraloke yā sassatadiṭṭhi sabbakālaṃ loko atthīti uppajjeyya.
tika-s0302t0:115_37: Sā na hotīti uppannuppannānaṃ nirodhassa navanavānañca uppādassa dassanato,
tika-s0302t0:117_2: Eseva nayoti iminā upayehi upādānādīnaṃ anatthantarataṃ atidisati.
tika-s0302t0:117_3: Tathā ca pana tesu duvidhatā upādīyati.
tika-s0302t0:117_4: Nanu ca cattāri upādānāni aññattha vuttānīti?
tika-s0302t0:117_6: tāni ca kho atthato dve evāti idha evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:117_9: saddena paroparassa subhaṃ asubhantiādīnañca saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:117_14: Vinibaddhoti virūpaṃ vimuccituṃ vā appadānavasena niyametvā baddho.
tika-s0302t0:118_0: “Abhiniveso”ti upayupādānānaṃ pavattiākāraviseso vuttoti āha “tañcāyanti tañca upayupādāna”nti.
tika-s0302t0:118_3: Dosamohavasenapi akusalacittappavatti taṇhādiṭṭhābhinivesūpanissayā evāti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo akusalassa cittassa adhiṭṭhānanti vuttā.
tika-s0302t0:118_9: Na upagacchatīti “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā taṇhādiṭṭhigatiyā na upasaṅkamati na allīyati.
tika-s0302t0:118_11: Na adhiṭṭhātīti na taṇhādiṭṭhigāhena adhiṭṭhāya pavattati.
tika-s0302t0:118_12: Attaniyagāho nāma sati attagāhe hotīti vuttaṃ “attā me”ti.
tika-s0302t0:118_13: Idaṃ dukkhaggahaṇaṃ upādānakkhandhāpassayaṃ tabbinimuttassa dukkhassa abhāvāti vuttaṃ “dukkhamevāti pañcupādānakkhandhamattamevā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:118_15: Kaṅkhaṃ na karotīti saṃsayaṃ na uppādeti sabbaso vicikicchāya samucchindanato.
tika-s0302t0:119_1: Missakasammādiṭṭhiṃ āhāti nāmarūpaparicchedato paṭṭhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā vuttattā lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ avoca.
tika-s0302t0:119_6: Sabbaṃ natthīti yathāsaṅkhataṃ bhaṅguppattiyā natthi eva,
tika-s0302t0:119_8: Sabbamatthīti ca yathā asaṅkhataṃ atthi vijjati,
tika-s0302t0:119_16: Sassataggāho hi idha paṭhamo antoti adhippeto.
tika-s0302t0:119_19: nirujjhantānaṃ asati nibbānappattiyaṃ yathāpaccayaṃ punūpagamanakathanato ucchedatañca anupagamma majjhimena
tika-s0302t0:122_2: Sā hi jarāmaraṇasīsena vuttesu saṅkhatadhammesu nibbindanākārena pavattati.
tika-s0302t0:122_5: Sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato vivaṭṭasannissitasīle patiṭṭhito upāsakopi pageva catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhito bhikkhu sammāpaṭipanno nāma.
tika-s0302t0:122_14: Tattha hi bhagavā tena bhikkhunā dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ pucchito taṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā vissajjesi.
tika-s0302t0:122_15: Yo hi vipassanaṃ maggaṃ anupādāvimuttiṃ pāpetvā kathetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0302t0:122_21: Yathāpucchitamattameva akathetvā apucchitampi atthaṃ dassento dhammānudhammapaṭipattiṃ anupādāya vimuttisaṅkhātaṃ visesaṃ pāpetvā.
tika-s0302t0:122_22: Bhagavā hi appaṃ yācito bahuṃ dento uḷārapuriso viya dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ pucchito paṭiccasamuppādamukhena
tika-s0302t0:122_23: tañceva tato ca uttariṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipattiṃ anupādāvimuttañca vissajjesi.
tika-s0302t0:122_25: dhammaṃ desetī”ti iminā dhammadesanaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ katvā dassesi.
tika-s0302t0:122_27: “anupādāvimutto hotī”ti iminā desanaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ katvā dassesi.
tika-s0302t0:126_2: Yena kāraṇena bhagavā acelakassa tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā cassa pañhaṃ kathesi,
tika-s0302t0:126_4: Gāravajananatthaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ paṭikkhipi tañca dhammassa sussūsāya.
tika-s0302t0:126_6: Sattānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetīti vibhattivipariṇāmavasena sādhāraṇato padaṃ
tika-s0302t0:126_7: yojetvā puna “ettakena kālenā”ti kassapassa vasena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:127_6: tena kataṃ nāma tassa kāraṇassa pubbe teneva kammassa upacitattāti ayaṃ nayo anavajjo.
tika-s0302t0:127_7: Diṭṭhigatiko pana pañcakkhandhavinimuttaṃ niccaṃ kārakavedakalakkhaṇaṃ attānaṃ parikappetvā tassa vasena
tika-s0302t0:127_10: Ettha ca yadi bāhirakehi parikappito attā nāma koci atthi,
tika-s0302t0:127_13: purimarūpāvijahanato kassaci visesādhānassa kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ahitato nivattanatthaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:127_14: hite ca vattanatthaṃ upadeso ca nippayojano siyā attavādino.
tika-s0302t0:127_17: Evañca attano ajaṭākāsassa viya dānādikiriyā hiṃsādikiriyā ca na sambhavati,
tika-s0302t0:127_18: tathā sukhassa dukkhassa ca anubhavanabandho eva attavādino na yujjati kammabandhābhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:127_20: Atha pana “dhammamattaṃ tassa uppajjati ceva vinassati ca.
tika-s0302t0:127_22: evampi purimarūpāvijahanena avaṭṭhitassa attano dhammamattanti na sakkā sambhāvetuṃ.
tika-s0302t0:127_24: tato aññe vā siyuṃ anaññe vā.
tika-s0302t0:127_26: na tāhi tassa uppannāhipi koci viseso atthi.
tika-s0302t0:127_27: Yo hi karoti paṭisaṃvedeti cavati upapajjati cāti icchitaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:127_31: uppādavināsavantīhi avatthāhi anaññassa attano tāsaṃ viya uppādavināsasambhavato kuto niccatāvakāso.
tika-s0302t0:127_32: Tāsampi vā attano viya niccatāpattīti bandhavimokkhānaṃ asambhavo evāti na yujjatevāyaṃ attavādo.
tika-s0302t0:127_33: Tenāha “attā nāma koci dukkhassa kārako natthīti dīpetī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:127_35: Adhiccasamuppannanti adhicca yadicchāya kiñci kāraṇaṃ kassaci vā pubbaṃ vinā samuppannaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:127_40: Sodhentoti sayaṃ visuddhaṃ katvā pucchitamatthaṃ eva attano pucchāya suddhiṃ dassento.
tika-s0302t0:128_12: tenāha “evaṃ sati pacchā sayaṃkataṃ dukkhanti ayaṃ laddhi hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:128_18: Vaṭṭadukkhaṃ adhippetaṃ avisesato atthīti ca vuttattā.
tika-s0302t0:128_26: Ekameva gaṇhantanti satipi vatthubhede ayoniso uppajjanena ekameva katvā gaṇhantaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:129_1: “Paraṃkataṃ dukkha”nti laddhiyā pagevātiādinā hettha vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:129_4: añño paṭisaṃvedayatīti saññācittavipallāsā bhavantīti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:129_5: Evaṃ satīti evaṃ muduke ucchedavipallāse paṭhamuppanne sati pacchā “paraṃkataṃ dukkha”nti ayaṃ laddhi hotīti sambandho.
tika-s0302t0:129_9: Evanti diṭṭhisahagatā vedanā sātasabhāvā kilesapariḷāhādinā saparissayā saupāyāsā, evaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:129_15: Yathā hetuphalabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ satipi ekasantānapariyāpannānaṃ bhinnasantatipatitehi
tika-s0302t0:129_16: visese hetuphalānaṃ paramatthato avinābhāvattā bhinnasantānapatitānaṃ viya accantabhedasanniṭṭhānena
tika-s0302t0:129_18: Evaṃ hetuphalabhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ vijjamānepi sabhāvabhede ekasantatipariyāpannatāya ekattanayena accantābhedagahaṇampi
tika-s0302t0:129_20: Santānavasena hi vattamānesu khandhesu ghanavinibbhogābhāvena ekattagahaṇanibandhano sattaggāho,
tika-s0302t0:129_23: tāvāyaṃ vijjatiyevāti gahaṇato nirudayavināso idha ucchedoti adhippetoti “uccheda”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:129_25: So pana maṃsacakkhupaññācakkhūnaṃ dassanapathātikkamoyeva hotīti vuttaṃ “adassana”nti.
tika-s0302t0:130_0: Ete teti vā ye ime tayā “sayaṃkataṃ dukkha”nti ca puṭṭhena mayā “so karoti,
tika-s0302t0:130_3: añño paṭisaṃvedayatī”tiādinā ca paṭikkhittā sassatucchedasaṅkhātā antā,
tika-s0302t0:130_5: Atha vā ete teti yattha puthū aññatitthiyā anupacitañāṇasambhāratāya paramagambhīraṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ
tika-s0302t0:130_6: suññataṃ appajānantā sassatucchede nimuggā sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na visahanti,
tika-s0302t0:130_7: ete te ubho ante anupagammāti yojanā.
tika-s0302t0:130_8: Desetīti paṭhamaṃ tāva anaññasādhāraṇe paṭipattidhamme ñāṇānubhāvena majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhito,
tika-s0302t0:130_9: karuṇānubhāvena desanādhamme majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhito dhammaṃ deseti.
tika-s0302t0:130_14: tasmā majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhito dhammaṃ desetīti yojanā.
tika-s0302t0:130_18: Na koci kārako vā vedako vā niddiṭṭho,
tika-s0302t0:130_22: dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti ettakena tāva padena.
tika-s0302t0:130_23: Sesapañhāti “sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca dukkha”ntiādikā sesā cattāro pañhā.
tika-s0302t0:130_26: natthi dukkha”nti pañho pāḷiyaṃ sarūpeneva paṭikkhittoti na uddhato.
tika-s0302t0:130_29: so hi pañho visuṃ visuṃ paṭikkhepena ekajjhaṃ paṭikkhepena ca.
tika-s0302t0:130_32: Ettha ca yassa attā kārako vedako vā icchito,
tika-s0302t0:130_34: Tathā ca sati anupubbadhammappavattiyā rūpādidhammānaṃ viya,
tika-s0302t0:130_35: sukhādidhammānaṃ viya cassa paccayāyattavuttitāya uppādavantatā āpajjati.
tika-s0302t0:130_36: Uppāde ca sati avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti anavakāsā niccatāti.
tika-s0302t0:130_37: Tassa “sayaṃkata”nti paṭhamapañhapaṭikkhepo pacchā ce attano niruḷhassa samudayo hotīti pubbe viya anena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:130_40: Tatiyapañho paṭikkhittoti evañca tatiyapañho paṭikkhitto veditabbo –
tika-s0302t0:130_41: “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā satataṃ samitaṃ paccayāyattassa dīpanena dukkhassa adhiccasamuppannatā paṭikkhittā,
tika-s0302t0:130_43: Tenāha bhagavā “evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:131_1: Vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasenāti “bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyaṃ upasampada”nti yācantena tena vuttavacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena.
tika-s0302t0:131_11: Aṭṭha vattānīti imāni aṭṭha titthiyavattāni pūrentena.
tika-s0302t0:131_12: Ettha ca nātikālena gāmappavesanā tattha visuddhakāyavacīsamācārena piṇḍāya caritvā nātidivāpaṭikkamananti idamekaṃ vattaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:132_0: Ayamettha pāṭhoti etasmiṃ kassapasutte ayaṃ pāṭho.
tika-s0302t0:132_2: Ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvāti yathā suvaṇṇaṃ nighaṃsitvā adhikaraṇiyā koṭṭetvā niddosameva gayhati,
tika-s0302t0:132_3: evaṃ parivāsavattacaraṇena ghaṃsitvā suddhabhāvavīmaṃsanena koṭṭetvā suddho eva aññatitthiyapubbo idha gayhati.
tika-s0302t0:132_4: Tibbacchandatanti sāsanaṃ anupavisitvā brahmacariyavāse tibbacchandataṃ daḷhatarābhirucitaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:132_5: Aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesīti nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpesi ehibhikkhuupasampadāya upanissayābhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:132_6: Gaṇe nisīditvāti bhikkhū attano santike pattāsanavasena gaṇe nisīditvā.
tika-s0302t0:135_5: Tenāha “sā vedanātiādi sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkhanti laddhiyā nisedhanatthaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-s0302t0:135_17: vedanāya kārako”ti laddhikassa diṭṭhigatikassa vādo paṭikkhitto,
tika-s0302t0:135_19: Tenāha “evañhi sati vedanāya eva vedanā katā hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t0:135_20: Imissāti yāya vedanāya sukhadukkhaṃ kataṃ, imissā.
tika-s0302t0:139_4: Ayaṃ kāyoti bālassa appahīnakilesassa paccuppannaṃ attabhāvaṃ rakkhaṃ katvā avijjāya paṭicchāditādīnave
tika-s0302t0:139_5: ayāthāvadassanavasena taṇhāya paṭiladdhacittassa taṃtaṃbhavūpagā saṅkhārā saṅkharīyanti.
tika-s0302t0:139_9: Ayaṃ atthoti “ayaṃ kāyo nāmarūpanti ca vutto”ti attho dīpetabbo upādānakkhandhasaḷāyatanasaṅgahato tesaṃ dhammānaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:139_11: taṇhāya ca saṃyuttattā evaṃ saparasantānagatasaviññāṇakakāyasaṅkhātaṃ dvayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t0:139_14: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”tiādinā ajjhattikabāhirāyatanāni bhinditvā cakkhurūpādidvayāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā,
tika-s0302t0:139_15: idha pana abhinditvā cha ajjhattikabāhirāyatanāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā “dvayaṃ paṭicca phasso”ti,
tika-s0302t0:139_16: tasmā mahādvayaṃ nāma kiretaṃ anavasesato ajjhattikabāhirāyatanānaṃ gahitattā.
tika-s0302t0:139_17: Ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanānīti etthāpi hi saḷāyatanāni saṅgahitāneva.
tika-s0302t0:140_2: Yehi mayaṃ bālapaṇḍitānaṃ samānepi kāyanibbattanādimhi visesaṃ jāneyyāma,
tika-s0302t0:140_12: Antarantarā yathādhammapaññattiyā paññāpitānaṃ dhammānaṃ anurūpato dassanaṃ hotīti āha “yathāsabhāvato …pe…
tika-s0302t0:140_14: Āpāthaṃ upagacchantānaṃ bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānanti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā dhammā.
tika-s0302t0:140_17: tasmā paṭivijjhanavasena bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
tika-s0302t0:140_19: Phasso āgacchatīti paṭivijjhanakavasena phasso ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
tika-s0302t0:140_20: āpāthaṃ āgacchantoyeva so atthato “ahaṃ kinnāmo”ti nāmaṃ pucchanto viya,
tika-s0302t0:140_21: bhagavā cassa nāmaṃ karonto viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ahaṃ bhagavā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t0:140_23: Bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātūti bhagavato eva bhāgo hotu,
tika-s0302t0:140_24: bhagavāva naṃ attano bhāgaṃ katvā vissajjetūti attho,
tika-s0302t0:140_26: amhākaṃ pana savanaṃ bhāgoti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:140_28: Keci pana paṭibhātūti atthaṃ vadanti ñāṇena dissatu desīyatūti vā attho.
tika-s0302t0:141_0: Bālassa paṇḍitassa ca kāyassa nibbattiyā paccayabhūtā avijjā ca taṇhā ca.
tika-s0302t0:141_8: Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā “sā eva tittirī,
tika-s0302t0:141_15: Yo pana ekantato tenattabhāvena arahattaṃ pattuṃ bhabbo,
tika-s0302t0:141_19: so ca yāva ariyabhūmiṃ na okkamati,
tika-s0302t0:141_20: tāva bāladhammasamaṅgī evāti katvā “sabbopi puthujjano bālo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:141_24: Te hi sikhāpattapaṇḍiccabhāvalakkhaṇābhāvato paṇḍitāti na vattabbā khīṇāsavā viya,
tika-s0302t0:141_25: balavatarānaṃ pana bāladhammānaṃ pahīnattā bālātipi na vattabbā puthujjanā viya.
tika-s0302t0:141_26: Bhajiyamānā pana catusaccasampaṭivedhaṃ upādāya paṇḍitapakkhaṃ bhajanti,
tika-s0302t0:144_1: Sabbampi saṅkhataṃ appaṭicca uppannaṃ nāma natthīti paccayadhammopi attano paccayadhammaṃ upādāya paccayuppanno,
tika-s0302t0:144_2: tathā paccayuppannadhammopi attano paccayuppannaṃ upādāya paccayadhammoti yathārahaṃ dhammānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatā.
tika-s0302t0:144_4: tesaṃ vasena suṭṭhu vibhāgaṃ katvā paṭiccasamuppādo desito.
tika-s0302t0:144_5: Yesaṃ pana vineyyānaṃ tadubhayasmiṃ vibhajja sute eva dhammābhisamayo hoti,
tika-s0302t0:144_6: te sandhāya bhagavā tadubhayaṃ vibhajja dassento “paṭiccasamuppādañca vo,
tika-s0302t0:144_8: desessāmi paṭiccasamuppanne ca dhamme”ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhīti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “satthā imasmiṃ sutte”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:144_12: Nanu ca jāti jarā maraṇañca sabhāvadhammo na hoti,
tika-s0302t0:144_13: yesaṃ pana khandhānaṃ jāti jarā maraṇañca,
tika-s0302t0:144_17: jāti jarā maraṇañhi paccayanibbattānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ vikāramattaṃ, naññesaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:144_19: Uppādā vā tathāgatānanti na vineyyapuggalānaṃ maggaphaluppatti viya jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇuppatti tathāgatuppādāyattā,
tika-s0302t0:144_20: atha kho sā tathāgatānaṃ uppādepi anuppādepi hotiyeva.
tika-s0302t0:144_21: Tasmā sā kāmaṃ asaṅkhatā viya dhātu na niccā,
tika-s0302t0:144_27: yāyaṃ idappaccayatā jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayatā tassa byabhicārābhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:144_28: Idāni na kadāci jāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayo na hoti hotiyevāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayabhāve niyameti.
tika-s0302t0:144_37: Hetugatavisesasamāyogo hi hetuphalassa evaṃ dhammatāniyāmo evāti.
tika-s0302t0:145_1: ṭhitāva sā dhātūti yāyaṃ jarāmaraṇassa idappaccayatā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti,
tika-s0302t0:145_4: majjhe ca paṭivijjhiyamāno na tathāgatehi uppādito,
tika-s0302t0:145_5: atha kho sambhavantassa jarāmaraṇassa sabbakālaṃ jātipaccayato sambhavoti ṭhitāva sā dhātu,
tika-s0302t0:145_6: kevalaṃ pana sayambhuñāṇena abhisambujjhanato “ayaṃ dhammo tathāgatena abhisambuddho”ti pavedanato ca tathāgato “dhammasāmī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0302t0:145_9: Sā eva “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ettha vipallāsābhāvato evaṃ avabujjhamānassa etassa sabhāvassa,
tika-s0302t0:145_10: hetuno vā tatheva bhāvato ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā,
tika-s0302t0:145_11: jāti vā jarāmaraṇassa uppādaṭṭhiti pavattaāyūhana- saṃyoga-
tika-s0302t0:145_13: hetupaccayaṭṭhitīti taduppādādibhāvenassā ṭhitatā “dhammaṭṭhitatā”ti phalaṃ pati sāmatthiyato hetumeva vadati.
tika-s0302t0:145_17: Dhammoti vā kāraṇaṃ paccayabhāvena phalassa dhāraṇato,
tika-s0302t0:145_19: dhammato ca añño sabhāvo natthīti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayo.
tika-s0302t0:145_22: Sā eva dhātu “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti imassa sabhāvassa,
tika-s0302t0:145_24: “na jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti viññāyamānassa ca tabbhāvābhāvato niyāmatā vavatthitabhāvoti dhammaniyāmatā.
tika-s0302t0:145_25: Phalassa vā jarāmaraṇassa jātiyā sati sambhavo dhamme hetumhi ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā,
tika-s0302t0:145_26: asati asambhavo dhammaniyāmatāti evaṃ phalena hetuṃ vibhāveti,
tika-s0302t0:145_28: Imesaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ paccayatāsaṅkhātaṃ idappaccayataṃ abhisambujjhati paccakkhakaraṇena abhimukhaṃ bujjhati yāthāvato paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0302t0:145_36: Vivaṭañhi vibhattañca atthaṃ hetūdāharaṇadassanehi pākaṭaṃ karonto uttānīkaroti.
tika-s0302t0:145_37: Uttānīkaronto tathā paccakkhabhūtaṃ katvā nigamanavasena passathāti cāha.
tika-s0302t0:146_1: Tehi tehi paccayehīti yāvatakehi paccayehi yaṃ phalaṃ uppajjamānārahaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:146_6: Tena taṃtaṃphalanipphādane tassā paccayasāmaggiyā tappakāratā tathatāti vuttāti dasseti.
tika-s0302t0:146_10: Tathāvidhapaccayasāmaggiyañhi satipi phalassa anuppajjane tassāvitathatā siyā.
tika-s0302t0:146_13: Na hi kadāci cakkhurūpālokamanasikārehi sotaviññāṇassa sambhavo atthi.
tika-s0302t0:146_21: idappaccayānaṃ samūho idappaccayatāti samūhattho tāsaddo yathā “janānaṃ samūho janatā”ti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-s0302t0:147_1: Jarāmaraṇaṃ na aniccaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ vikārabhāvato anipphannattā,
tika-s0302t0:147_4: Samāgantvā kataṃ sahiteheva paccayehi nibbattetabbato yathāsabhāvaṃ samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ.
tika-s0302t0:147_5: Paccayārahaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca na vinā tena sahitasametameva uppannanti paṭiccasamuppannaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:147_13: Kiccānubhāvakkhaṇeti ettha kiccānubhāvo nāma yathā pavattamāne paccaye tassa phalaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0302t0:147_17: yasmiṃ khaṇe paccayo attano phaluppādanaṃ pati byāvaṭo nāma hoti,
tika-s0302t0:147_18: imasmiṃ khaṇe ye dhammā rūpādayo upalabbhanti tato pubbe,
tika-s0302t0:147_22: Yadi evaṃ nippariyāyatova jātiyā kutoci uppatti siddhi,
tika-s0302t0:148_5: “Purimaṃ anta”nti vuccamāne paccuppannabhāvassapi gahaṇaṃ siyāti “purimaṃ antaṃ atīta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:148_6: Vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañcāti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti atīte attano vijjamānataṃ,
tika-s0302t0:148_8: tato pubbe na nu kho ahosi”nti atīte attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Kasmā?
tika-s0302t0:148_10: Tassā pana atītavatthutāya gahitattā sassatādhiccasamuppattiākāranissitatā dassitā eva.
tika-s0302t0:148_11: Āsappanaparisappanapavattikaṃ katthacipi appaṭivattihetubhūtaṃ vicikicchaṃ kasmā uppādetīti na vicāretabbametanti
tika-s0302t0:148_20: Tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ santānaṃ majjhimaṃ pamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:148_24: Te hi “kathaṃ nu kho”ti issarena vā brahmunā vā pubbakatena vā ahetuto vā nibbattoti cintetīti vadanti.
tika-s0302t0:148_29: Vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañcāti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhāna”nti anāgate attano vijjamānataṃ,
tika-s0302t0:148_31: tato paraṃ nu kho bhavissāmī”ti anāgate attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhatīti heṭṭhā vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:149_0: Paccuppannaṃ addhānanti addhāpaccuppannassa idhādhippetattā “paṭisandhimādiṃ katvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:149_7: Ummattako viya bālaputhujjanoti paṭikacceva vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:149_9: Muṇḍesunti muṇḍena anicchantaṃ jāgaraṇakāle na sakkāti suttaṃ muṇḍesuṃ kuladhammavasena yathā ekacce kulatāpasā.
tika-s0302t0:150_0: Attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati kaṇṇo viya sūtaputtasaññī,
tika-s0302t0:150_2: Jātiyā vibhāviyamānāya “aha”nti tassa attano parāmasanaṃ sandhāyāha “evampi siyā kaṅkhā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:150_3: Manussāpi ca rājāno viyāti manussāpi ca keci ekacce rājāno viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:150_11: paramatthato pana sā attabhāvavisayāvāti āha “attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0302t0:155_1: Paṭhamaṃ dutiyasseva saṅkhepo paṭhamasutte saṅkhepavuttassa atthassa vitthāravasena dutiyasuttassa desitattā,
tika-s0302t0:155_2: tañca pana bhagavā paṭhamasuttaṃ saṅkhepato desesi,
tika-s0302t0:155_4: Paṭhamaṃ vā saṃkhittarucīnaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena saṅkhepato desesi,
tika-s0302t0:155_5: dutiyaṃ pana attano ruciyā tato vitthārato.
tika-s0302t0:155_7: te attano ruciyā kathentā attano thāmaṃ dassentāva kathenti,
tika-s0302t0:155_9: tasmiṃ saṃvaṇṇite paṭhamaṃ saṃvaṇṇitameva hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:158_10: Pakatihatthikulanti giricaranadicaravanacarādippabhedā gocariyakāḷāvakanāmā sabbāpi balena pākatikā hatthijāti.
tika-s0302t0:158_13: Ekassāti ca tathā heṭṭhākathāyaṃ āgatattā desanāsotena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:158_15: tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ,
tika-s0302t0:158_20: Tadubhayaṃ panassa kāraṇena dassetuṃ “etañhi nissāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:158_24: puggalañca taṃsamaṅgiṃ neyyesu adhibalaṃ karotīti āha “akampanaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhena cā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:159_1: Kāraṇañhi yasmā phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttitāya uppajjati ceva pavattati ca,
tika-s0302t0:159_4: Tadubhayaṃ bhagavā yena ñāṇena ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū paccayā uppādāya,
tika-s0302t0:159_6: ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ na hetū na paccayā uppādāya,
tika-s0302t0:159_12: Ṭhānaso hetusoti paccayato ca hetuto ca.
tika-s0302t0:159_15: Sabbatthagāminīpaṭipadājānananti sabbagatigāminiyā agatigāminiyā ca paṭipadāya maggassa jānanaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:159_16: bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ hanantesu “imassa cetanā nirayagāminī bhavissati,
tika-s0302t0:159_17: imassa tiracchānayonigāminī”ti iminā nayena ekavatthusmimpi kusalākusalacetanāsaṅkhātānaṃ paṭipattīnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvajānanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:159_19: tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ viparītatāya nānappakāradhātuno khandhāyatanadhātulokassa jānanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:159_23: Indriyaparopariyattajānananti saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ parabhāvassa aparabhāvassa vuddhiyā ceva hāniyā ca jānanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:159_30: tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti evaṃ vuttapaguṇajjhānassa ceva bhavaṅgaphalasamāpattīnañca jānanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:159_31: Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0302t0:159_34: Phalasamāpattiyā nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhānameva sandhāya “tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:159_36: Cutūpapātajānananti sattānaṃ cutiyā upapattiyā ca yāthāvato jānanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:160_4: Taṃ pana ñāṇasampadaṃ pahānasampadaṃ desanāvisesasampadaṃ khemaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ catubbidhaṃ paccavekkhaṇāñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:160_8: Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānatoti “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti evaṃ paṭijānantena tayā.
tika-s0302t0:160_11: idaṃ terasamaṃ āyatana”nti veditabbā ime dhammā.
tika-s0302t0:161_1: Kocīti samaṇādīhi añño vā yo koci.
tika-s0302t0:161_9: Khemappattoti akhemappattarūpāya codanāya anupaddavaṃ patto niccalabhāvappatto.
tika-s0302t0:161_13: ime āsavāti kāmāsavādīsu ime nāma āsavā na parikkhīṇāti āsavakkhayavacanenettha sabbakilesappahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:161_20: Dhamme niyyante taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo niyyānikoti voharito hotīti tassa paṭikkhipanto “so na niyyātī”ti āha.
tika-s0302t0:161_24: Atha vā “dhammo desito”ti ariyadhammassa adhippetattā na koci virodho.
tika-s0302t0:162_6: Catassopi hi parisā buddhābhimukhā evaṃ tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0302t0:162_10: Yesaṃ baluppādāvaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena usabhassa āsabhaṇṭhānaṃ icchitaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:162_11: tato sātisayānaṃ eva tesaṃ vasena āsabhaṇṭhānaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:162_12: Yaṃ kiñci loke upamaṃ nāma buddhaguṇānaṃ nidassanabhāvena vuccati,
tika-s0302t0:162_14: Tiṭṭhamāno cāti atiṭṭhantopi tiṭṭhamāno eva paṭijānāti nāma.
tika-s0302t0:163_0: Aṭṭha kho imāti idaṃ vesārajjañāṇassa baladassanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:163_1: Yathā hi byattaṃ parisaṃ ajjhogāhetvā viññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādhanasamatthāya kathāya dhammakathikassa chekabhāvo paññāyati,
tika-s0302t0:163_2: evaṃ imā aṭṭha parisā patvā satthu vesārajjañāṇassa balaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t0:163_9: Manussā hi “ettha rājā nisinno”ti vutte pakativacanampi vattuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-s0302t0:163_13: gahapatayo nānāvohāresu ca akkharacintāya ca kusalā,
tika-s0302t0:163_15: tesaṃ majjhe dhammakathākathanaṃ nāma ativiya bhāriyaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:163_17: Amanussoti hi vuttamatte manussānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ kampati,
tika-s0302t0:163_18: tesaṃ rūpaṃ disvāpi saddaṃ sutvāpi sattā visaññitāpi honti.
tika-s0302t0:163_23: Yāmādayo hi uḷāruḷāre kāme paṭisevantā tatthābhigiddhatāya dhammassavanāya sabhāvena cittampi na uppādenti,
tika-s0302t0:163_24: mahābodhisattānaṃ pana buddhānañca ānubhāvena ākaḍḍhiyamānā kadāci nesaṃ payirupāsanādīni karonti tādise mahāsamaye.
tika-s0302t0:163_25: Teneva hi vimānavatthudesanāpi taṃnimittā bahulā nāhosi.
tika-s0302t0:163_31: Yathā vātiādi “sīhanādasadisaṃ vā nādaṃ nadatī”ti saṅkhepato vuttassa atthassa viññāpanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:164_1: Paññāpabhāvitanti cirakālaparibhāvitāya pāramitāpaññāya vipassanāpaññāya ca uppāditaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:164_2: Karuṇāpabhāvitanti “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinayappavattāya mahākaruṇāya uppāditaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:164_3: Yathā abhinikkhamanato pabhuti mahābodhisattānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamanavirodhinī paṭipatti natthi,
tika-s0302t0:164_4: evaṃ tusitabhavanato niyatabhāvāpattito ca paṭṭhāyāti dutiyatatiyanayā ca gahitā.
tika-s0302t0:164_6: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ vajirūpamatāyeva sātisayo paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:164_7: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti “aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe…
tika-s0302t0:164_9: Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti,
tika-s0302t0:164_10: tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ pavattitacakkassa cakkavattino cakkaratanassa ṭhānaṃ viya.
tika-s0302t0:164_12: saddena lokiyadesanāñāṇassa itarena anaññasādhāraṇatāvasena samānataṃ sampiṇḍeti.
tika-s0302t0:164_13: Urasi jātatāya uraso sambhūtanti orasaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:165_1: saddo anavasesato rūpassa sarūpanidassanatthoti tassa “idaṃ rūpa”nti etena sādhāraṇato ca sarūpanidassanamāha.
tika-s0302t0:165_2: Ettakaṃ rūpanti etena anavasesato “ito uddhaṃ rūpaṃ natthī”ti nimittassa aññassa abhāvaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:165_7: vasenāti kakkhaḷattādilakkhaṇavasena sandhāraṇādirasavasena sampaṭicchanādipaccupaṭṭhānavasena bhūtattayādipadaṭṭhānavasena ca.
tika-s0302t0:165_8: Evaṃ pariggahitassāti evaṃ sādhāraṇato ca lakkhaṇādito ca pariggahitassa.
tika-s0302t0:165_13: tasmā purimabhave siddhāya avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpassa samudayo rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho.
tika-s0302t0:165_15: Avijjādīhi ca tīhi atītakālikattā tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ upādānampi gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:165_18: “āhārasamudayā”ti pana gahitena pavattipaccayatāmattena utucittānipi gahitāneva hontīti dvādasasamuṭṭhānikaṃ
tika-s0302t0:165_21: Tattha bhūtavasena magge udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena anukkamena khaṇavasena passati.
tika-s0302t0:165_22: Avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:165_29: Tasmā taṃ padaṭṭhānavasena pageva passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati.
tika-s0302t0:166_10: phuṭṭho cetetī”ti vacanato tīsu vedanādīsu khandhesu phassasamudayāti vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:166_11: Viññāṇappaccayā nāmarūpa”nti vacanato viññāṇakkhandhe nāmarūpasamudayāti vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:166_12: Tesaṃyeva vasenāti “avijjānirodho vedanānirodho”tiādinā tesaṃyeva avijjādīnaṃ vasena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:167_0: Upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayatthaṅgamavasena titthiyānaṃ avisayopi sappadeso sīhanādo dassito.
tika-s0302t0:167_1: Idāni nippadeso anulomapaṭilomavasena saṅkhepato vitthārato paccayākāravisayo anaññasādhāraṇo dassīyatīti āha,
tika-s0302t0:167_5: imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujhtī”ti avijjādīnaṃ bhāve saṅkhārādīnaṃ bhāvassa,
tika-s0302t0:167_6: avijjādīnaṃ nirodhe saṅkhārādīnaṃ nirodhassa kathanena purimasmiṃ paccayalakkhaṇe niyamo dassito “imasmiṃ sati eva, nāsati,
tika-s0302t0:167_11: Tenedaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ antogadhaniyamaṃ idha paṭiccasamuppādassa vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:167_12: Nirodhoti ca avijjādīnaṃ virāgā vigamena āyatiṃ anuppādo appavatti.
tika-s0302t0:167_15: yena so uppādanirodhavibhāgena vutto “imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:167_18: “Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti idameva hi lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:167_19: Pariyāyantarena “imassa uppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti vadantena parena purimaṃ visesitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t0:167_20: Tasmā na vattamānaṃyeva sandhāya “imasmiṃ satī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:167_22: Yasmā ca “imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0302t0:167_23: imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti dvidhāpi uddiṭṭhassa lakkhaṇassa niddesaṃ vadantena bhagavatā “avijjāya
tika-s0302t0:167_25: tasmā natthibhāvopi nirodho evāti natthibhāvaviruddho atthibhāvo anirodhoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t0:167_27: Tato idha na kevalaṃ atthibhāvamattaṃ uppādoti attho adhippeto,
tika-s0302t0:167_28: atha kho anirodhasaṅkhāto atthibhāvo cāti ayamattho vibhāvito hoti.
tika-s0302t0:167_29: Evametaṃ lakkhaṇadvayavacanaṃ aññamaññaṃ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena sātthakanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:167_33: Appahīnabhāvo ca anibbattitaphalabhāvena phaluppādanārahatā cāti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-s0302t0:168_0: Pañcakkhandhavibhajanādivasenāti pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ dvādasapadikassa paccayākārassa vibhajanavasena.
tika-s0302t0:168_4: so pana atthato ca saddato ca pihito heṭṭhāmukhajāto vā na hotīti āha “anikujjito”ti.
tika-s0302t0:168_7: Pakāsitoti ñāṇobhāsena obhāsito ādīpitoti āha “dīpito jotito”ti.
tika-s0302t0:168_12: tassa chinnapilotikassa paṭilomatā chinnabhinnatābhāvenāti dassento “na hetthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:168_17: Attano rūpapavattiyā karaṇḍaṃ kucchitaṃ dhuttaṃ vāti pavattetīti kāraṇḍavo, dussīlo.
tika-s0302t0:168_23: Tathā hi taṇḍulasārarahito dhaññapaṭirūpako thusamattako palāpoti vuccati,
tika-s0302t0:168_24: evaṃ sīlādisārarahito samaṇapaṭirūpako palāpo viyāti palāpo, dussīlo.
tika-s0302t0:169_0: Saddhāya pabbajitenāti rājūpaddavādīhi anupaddutena “evañhi taṃ otiṇṇaṃ jātiādisaṃsārabhayaṃ vijinissāmī”ti
tika-s0302t0:169_6: kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhabhāvena vīriyaṃ ārabhantassa tathāpavattavīriyavasena “taco ekaṃ aṅga”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:169_9: iriyāpathavasena catūsū”ti evaṃ navasu ṭhānesu vīriyaṃ samādhātabbaṃ pavattetabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:170_0: So dukkhaṃ viharatīti kusītapuggalo niyyānikasāsane vīriyārambhassa akaraṇena sāmaññatthassa anuppattiyā dukkhaṃ viharati.
tika-s0302t0:170_4: Kusītassa atthaparihāyanaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “cha dvārānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:170_9: tattha dānamicchāya paresaṃ makhaṃ passantoti attho.
tika-s0302t0:172_3: īsakampi katakālusiyavigataṭṭhena maṇḍaṭṭhena ca pasannampi surādi na pātabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:172_6: Pātabbañca pattena viya sukhena paribhuñjitabbato duccaritasabbakilesakasāvamalapaṅkadosarahitattā ca.
tika-s0302t0:173_1: Tassa ekasseva pana desanāmaṇḍassa paṭiggāhakā suppaṭipannā dosarahitā catasso parisā paṭiggahamaṇḍo.
tika-s0302t0:173_5: Tathā hi ādito “catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ ācikkhaṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:173_6: Pubbabhāge “atthi ayaṃ loko”tiādinā idhalokaparalokagatasammosavigamena pavatto adhimokkhova adhimokkhamaṇḍo.
tika-s0302t0:173_8: Catubhūmakassa saddhindriyassa adhimokkhamaṇḍena maṇḍabhūtaṃ adhimokkhaṃ. Ādi-
tika-s0302t0:173_17: tassa vā vasena dosadhātūnaṃ vamanaṃ virecanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:173_18: Evamevāti yathā bhesajjamaṇḍaṃ vejjasammukhā nirāsaṅkā pivanti,
tika-s0302t0:173_24: tathā sammāpaṭipajjantānaṃ paresaṃ atthanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0302t0:176_1: Jānato passatoti ettha dassanaṃ paññācakkhunāva dassanaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:176_3: Evaṃ santepīti padadvayassa ekatthattepi ñāṇalakkhaṇañāṇappabhāvavisayasssa tathādassanabhāvāvirodhanāti attho.
tika-s0302t0:176_7: Jānato passatoti ca jānanadassanamukhena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā pavattāti āha –
tika-s0302t0:176_11: Jānatoti vā vatvā na jānanaṃ anussavākāraparivitakkamattavasena idhādhippetaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:176_12: atha kho rūpāni viya cakkhuviññāṇena rūpādīni tesañca samudayādike paccakkhe katvā dassananti vibhāvetuṃ “passato”ti vuttanti evaṃ vā ettha attho.
tika-s0302t0:177_1: So pana tesaṃ anuppādanirodho sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvo evāti āha “asamuppādo khīṇākāro natthibhāvo”ti.
tika-s0302t0:177_2: Āsavakkhayasaddassa khīṇākārādīsu āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “āsavānaṃ khayā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:177_3: Ujumaggānusārinoti kilesavaṅkakāyavaṅkādīnaṃ pahānena ujubhūte savipassanāheṭṭhimamaggadhamme anussarantassa.
tika-s0302t0:177_5: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ “tato aññā anantarā”ti khayasaṅkhāte aggamagge tappariyāpannameva ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0302t0:177_8: samucchedavasena pana “āsave khīṇe maggo khayo”ti vuccatīti āha “maggo āsavakkhayoti vutto”ti.
tika-s0302t0:178_0: Jānato eva passato evāti evamettha niyamo icchito,
tika-s0302t0:178_1: na aññathā visesābhāvato aniṭṭhāpannovāti tassa niyamassa phalaṃ dassetuṃ “no ajānato no apassato”ti vuttanti āha “yo pana na jānāti,
tika-s0302t0:178_4: Iminā khandhānaṃ pariññā āsavakkhayassa ekantikakāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-s0302t0:178_8: “Bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti ahetū appaccayā sattā visujjhantī”ti evamādivādā.
tika-s0302t0:178_11: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ saṃsārādīhīti ettheva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:178_17: yadidaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ apariññāti “jānato passato”ti imināva aniyamavacanena anupāyapaṭisedhopi atthato bodhito hotīti.
tika-s0302t0:178_18: Tameva hi atthato bodhitabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ evaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:179_4: Yathāha “na kho dabba dabbā evaṃ nibbeṭhentī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:179_5: Vattasīse ṭhatvāti vattaṃ uttamaṃ dhuraṃ katvā.
tika-s0302t0:179_6: Yo hi parisuddhājīvo kātuṃ ajānantānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ attano vā vassavātādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ chattādīni karoti,
tika-s0302t0:179_8: Padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ nāthakaraṇadhammabhāvena maggaphalādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:179_11: Evaṃ jānatoti evaṃ vejjakammādīnaṃ jānanahetu micchājīvapaccayā kāmāsavādayo āsavā vaḍḍhantiyeva,
tika-s0302t0:179_14: āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti imāya pāḷiyā arahattasseva gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ phalaggahaṇena hetuno avuttasiddhattā.
tika-s0302t0:180_10: Manasmiṃ vivaṭṭanissite pana anantarūpanissayāpi paccayā sambhavantīti “labbhamānavasena paccayabhāvo veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:181_4: Paṭisaṅkhānupassanāpi muccitukamyatāpakkhikā evāti adhippāyena “catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:181_6: tāva taruṇavipassanā”ti hi vacanato upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇato paraṃ balavavipassanā.
tika-s0302t0:181_7: Rūpārūpadhammānaṃ visesabhūto sāmaññabhūto ca yo yo sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo,
tika-s0302t0:181_10: Paccakkhakaraṇatthena ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā ca gahitā hoti.
tika-s0302t0:181_16: So hi pādakajjhānasamādhi taruṇavipassanāya paccayo hoti.
tika-s0302t0:182_4: saupanisaṃ vadāmī”ti ettha adhippetasukhaṃ dassetuṃ “appanāpubbabhāgassa sukhassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:182_5: “Passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedetī”ti vuttaappanāsukhassa passaddhiyā paccayatte vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0302t0:182_8: Tādisā hi vitakkavicārasukhasamādhīhi laddhappaccayā nīvaraṇaṃ vikkhambhantī taṃnimittaṃ darathaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭipassambheti.
tika-s0302t0:182_12: Saddhāti ratanattayaguṇānaṃ kammaphalassa ca saddahanavasena pavatto adhimokkho,
tika-s0302t0:182_13: sā pana yasmā attano visaye punappunaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0302t0:182_17: tasmā āha “sā hi dubbalapītiyā paccayo hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:182_18: Dukkhadukkhādibhedassa sabbassapi dukkhassa vaṭṭadukkhantogadhattā tassa ca idhādhippetattā vuttaṃ “dukkhanti vaṭṭadukkha”nti.
tika-s0302t0:182_25: Yasmā “ācariyānaṃ santike dhammaṃ sutvā pavattidukkha”nti cintayato “ekantato ayaṃ dhammo imassa dukkhassa samatikkamāya hotī”ti saddhā uppajjati.
tika-s0302t0:182_28: Jātiyā pana asati tattha tattha bhave natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti āha “sā hi vaṭṭadukkhassa paccayo”ti.
tika-s0302t0:182_35: So hi tena vipassanāya kiñci kiñci visesaṭṭhānaṃ kayiratīti taṃ anāmasitvā nibbidūpaniso virāgoti “virāgo”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:183_0: Kena udakena vidārayitvā gatapadesoti katvā kandaro.
tika-s0302t0:183_4: Hemantagimhautuvasena aṭṭha māse pavatto pathavīvivaroti katvā padaro.
tika-s0302t0:183_11: taṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ “avijjā pabbatoti daṭṭhabbā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:183_12: Tattha avijjā ca santānavasena ciraṃtanakālappavattanato pacurajanehi duppajahanato “pabbato”ti vuttā.
tika-s0302t0:184_0: Tattha yasmā purimasiddhāya avijjāya sati abhisaṅkhārā, nāsati,
tika-s0302t0:184_1: tasmā te uparipabbate pavattā viya hontīti vuttaṃ “avijjā…pe…
tika-s0302t0:184_4: Taṇhāya abhilāsaṃ katvāti etena sabbassapi abhisaṅkhāravuṭṭhitemanatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0302t0:184_6: Antimabhavikassa antabhavanibbattako abhisaṅkhāro nibbānaṃ na patto,
tika-s0302t0:184_7: tadantassa bhāgassa nibbānaṃ āhacca ṭhito viya hotīti “mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitakālo viyā”ti upamānidassanaṃ kataṃ.
