tika-s0302t0:645_2: Tathābhūto pana daliddo varāko nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “daliddaṃ kapaṇa”nti.
tika-s0302t0:645_4: aññehipi sarīrāvayavehi dussaṇṭhānehi upeto durupeto evāti.
tika-s0302t0:651_5: Ekekavaṇṇakālova gahetabboti etena mahiṃsādīnaṃ rassadīghapiṅgalādīsu ekekāneva gahetvā dasseti.
tika-s0302t0:654_2: mātugāmānañca purisakālo”ti yathā sattasantāne liṅganiyamo natthi,
tika-s0302t0:655_0: Cakkavāḷe mātugāmakāle namātābhūtapubbo natthītiādinā liṅganiyamena cakkavāḷaniyamo ca veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:658_1: Ekaṃ apadānaṃ āharitvā dasseti “evaṃ saṃvegaṃ janetvā bhikkhū visesaṃ pāpessāmī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:658_3: Dvinnaṃ buddhānanti kakusandhassa koṇāgamanassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:658_4: “Tivarā rohitassā suppiyā”ti manussānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle samaññā tattha desanāmavasena jātāti veditabbā,
tika-s0302t0:659_0: Puna vassasatanti paṭhamavassasatato uparivassasataṃ jīvanako nāma manusso natthi.
tika-s0302t0:659_2: Vaḍḍhitvāti dasavassāyukabhāvato paṭṭhāya yāva asaṅkhyeyyāyukabhāvā vaḍḍhitvā.
tika-s0302t0:665_1: Santuṭṭhoti sakena uccāvacena paccayena samameva ca tussanako.
tika-s0302t0:665_10: Iti yena kenaci hīnena vā paṇītena vā cīvarādipaccayena santussito tathāpavatto alobho itarītarapaccayasantoso,
tika-s0302t0:666_0: Yathāladdhato aññassa apatthanā nāma siyā appicchatāya pavattiākāroti tato vinivattitameva santosassa sarūpaṃ dassento “labhantopi na gaṇhātī”ti āha.
tika-s0302t0:666_1: Taṃ parivattetvāti pakatidubbalādīnaṃ garucīvaraṃ na phāsubhāvāvahaṃ sarīrabādhāvahañca hotīti payojanavasena,
tika-s0302t0:666_3: Lahukacīvaraparibhoge santosavirodhi na hotīti āha “lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:666_4: Mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvā tāni vissajjetvā aññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti āha “tesaṃ…pe…
tika-s0302t0:667_1: Avasesaniddāya abhibhūtattā paṭibujjhato sahasā pāpakā vitakkā pātubhavantīti.
tika-s0302t0:668_2: Buddhādīhi vaṇṇitanti “pūtimuttabhesajjaṃ nissāya yā pabbajjā”tiādinā sammāsambuddhādīhi pasatthaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:669_1: santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti seyyathāpi āyasmā bākulatthero.
tika-s0302t0:669_3: santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti seyyathāpi thero upanando sakyaputto.
tika-s0302t0:669_5: na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti seyyathāpi thero lāḷudāyī.
tika-s0302t0:669_8: Uttasatīti “kathaṃ nu kho labheyya”nti jātuttāsena uttasati.
tika-s0302t0:669_13: Lobhoyeva ārammaṇena saddhiṃ ganthanaṭṭhena bajjhanaṭṭhena gedho lobhagedho.
tika-s0302t0:670_1: bhagavatā pana vattabbaniyāmena “yathā kassapo bhikkhū”ti bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:670_4: Paṭipattiṃ paripūraṃ katvā pūraṇaṃ bhāro satthu āṇāya sirasā sampaṭicchitabbato.
tika-s0302t0:674_3: Anuppannāti veditabbā tathārūpe vatthārammaṇe tathā anuppannapubbattā.
tika-s0302t0:674_8: Imeti vuttanayena paccayalābhena pacchā uppajjamānā pāḷiyaṃ tathā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:675_5: Imassa pana sammappadhānassāti catutthassa sammappadhānassa vasena.
tika-s0302t0:675_6: Ayaṃ desanāti “uppannā me kusalā dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu”nti ayaṃ desanā katā.
tika-s0302t0:675_8: saṃvatteyyāti idaṃ āyatiṃ sattasu attabhāvesu uppajjamānadukkhasaṅkhātaanatthuppattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:675_9: “Ātāpī ottappī bhabbo sambodhāyā”tiādivacanato “ime cattāro sammappadhānā pubbabhāgavipassanāvasena kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:678_5: Attano pana sommabhāvena mahājanassa piyo manāpo.
tika-s0302t0:678_8: Na kevalaṃ candūpamatāya ettako eva guṇo,
tika-s0302t0:678_9: atha kho aññepi santīti te dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:678_13: evaṃ bhikkhu taṃ taṃ disaṃ upagacchati kulānuddayāya.
tika-s0302t0:678_14: Yathā cando kaṇhapakkhato sukkapakkhaṃ upagacchanto kalāhi vaḍḍhamāno hutvā niccanavo hoti,
tika-s0302t0:678_15: evaṃ bhikkhu kaṇhapakkhaṃ pahāya sukkapakkhaṃ upagantvā guṇehi vaḍḍhamāno lokassa vā pāmojjapāsaṃsattho
tika-s0302t0:678_16: niccanavatāya candasamacitto adhunupasampanno viya ca niccanavo hutvā carati.
tika-s0302t0:679_1: Taṃ nekkhammābhimukhaṃ kāyacittānaṃ ākaḍḍhanaṃ kāyato apanayanañca hotīti āha “ākaḍḍhitvā apanetvāti attho”ti.
tika-s0302t0:679_2: Catukkañcettha sambhavatīti taṃ dassetuṃ “yo hi bhikkhū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:680_3: Evaṃ vicariṃsūti kiñjakkhavasena pariggahābhāvena yathā ime,
tika-s0302t0:681_6: saddena antaragharappavesane aññattha ca yathāvuttato aññaṃ asāruppakiriyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0302t0:681_7: Tatthevāti saṅghamajjhe gaṇamajjhe puggalassa ca vuḍḍhassa santike.
tika-s0302t0:682_1: Pāpicchatāpi manopāgabbhiyanti eteneva kodhūpanāhādīnaṃ samudācāro manopāgabbhiyanti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t0:683_5: Vāyupatthambhakaṃ gāhāpetvāti kāyaṃ tathā upatthambhakaṃ katvā.
tika-s0302t0:685_0: Aṅgulīhi nikkhantapabhā ākāsasañcalanena diguṇā hutvā ākāse vicariṃsūti āha “yamakavijjutaṃ cārayamāno viyā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:685_1: “Ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesī”ti padassa aññattha anāgatattā “asambhinnapada”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:686_7: saddena ākāse calitapāṇi viya katthaci alaggatāya parisuddhajjhāsayatā sattesu kāruññanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0302t0:689_4: Sā pana avakhaṇḍiyanā dukkhāpanā aṭṭiyanā hotīti vuttaṃ “aṭṭīyatī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:689_5: Tenāha bhagavā “so tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayatī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:692_1: Chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne chiddassa aputhulattā aggaḷaṃ adatvāva suttena saṃsibbanamattena aggaḷadānena ca chidde puthule.
tika-s0302t0:693_7: atha kasmā “jiṇṇosi dāni tva”ntiādimavocāti āha “yathā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t0:694_1: Amānusikā savanaratīti atikkantamānusikāya araññasadduppattiyā araññehaṃ vasāmīti vivekavāsūpanissayādhīnasaddasavanapaccayā dhammarati uppajjati.
tika-s0302t0:694_4: Tatthevāti tasmiṃyeva ekassa viharaṇaṭṭhāne viharaṇasamaye ca phāsu bhavati cittavivekasambhavato.
tika-s0302t0:695_3: Apiṇḍapātikādhīno itarassa visesajotakoti tamevassa visesaṃ dassetuṃ “akālacārī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:696_0: Amhākaṃ salākaṃ gahetvā bhattatthāya gehaṃ anāgacchantassa sattāhaṃ na pātetabbanti sāmikehi dinnattā sattāhaṃ salākaṃ na labhati,
tika-s0302t0:698_0: “Amukasmiṃ senāsane vasantā bahuṃ vassavāsikaṃ labhantī”ti tathā na vassavāsikaṃ pariyesanto carati vassavāsikasseva aggahaṇato.
tika-s0302t0:698_2: Tena bahuparikkhārabhāvena phāsuvihāro natthi parikkhārānaṃ rakkhaṇapaṭijagganādidukkhabahulatāya.
tika-s0302t0:701_1: Attano ṭhāneti sabrahmacārīnaṃ ovādakaviññāpakabhāvena attano mahāsāvakaṭṭhāne ṭhapanatthaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:701_2: Atha vā yasmā “ahaṃ dāni na ciraṃ ṭhassāmi,
tika-s0302t0:701_5: ovadanto anusāsanto mamaccayena bhikkhūnaṃ mayā kātabbakiccaṃ karissatī”ti adhippāyena bhagavā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
tika-s0302t0:701_15: Atikkamma vadanteti aññamaññaṃ atikkamitvā atimaññitvā vadante.
tika-s0302t0:701_16: Bahuṃ bhāsissatīti dhammaṃ kathento ko vipulaṃ katvā kathessati.
tika-s0302t0:701_18: Amadhuranti na madhuraṃ na kaṇṇasukhaṃ na pemanīyaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:701_19: Lahuññeva uṭṭhāti appavattanena kūlaṭṭhānaṃ viya tassa kathanaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:704_4: Na hi kalyāṇamittarahitassa kāci sampatti nāma atthīti.
tika-s0302t0:707_6: Evaṃ sakkāre kayiramāneti “bhaddako vatāyaṃ bhikkhū”ti ādarajātehi bhikkhūhi sakkāre kayiramāne.
tika-s0302t0:707_8: “Ehi bhikkhū”ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ attano mukhābhimukhaṃ karontā vadanti.
tika-s0302t0:707_9: Yañhi tanti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ upaddavoti vuccati anatthajananato.
tika-s0302t0:710_1: Yāvadevāti iminā samānatthaṃ “yāvade”ti idaṃ padanti āha “yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:710_5: Āsavānaṃ khayāti āsavānaṃ khayahetu ariyamaggena sabbaso āsavānaṃ khepitattā.
tika-s0302t0:713_1: Lābhasakkārahetupi ekacce bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti,
tika-s0302t0:713_2: evamevaṃ ayaṃ pana thero na lābhasakkārahetu bhikkhunupassayagamanaṃ yācati,
tika-s0302t0:713_4: Eso hi ānandatthero ussukkāpetvā paṭipattiguṇaṃ dassento yasmā tā bhikkhuniyo catusaccakammaṭṭhānikā,
tika-s0302t0:713_5: tasmā pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayādipakāsaniyā dhammakathāya vipassanāpaṭipattisampadaṃ dassesi.
tika-s0302t0:713_6: Aniccādilakkhaṇāni ceva udayabbayādike ca sammā dassesi.
tika-s0302t0:713_11: Samuttejesīti vipassanāya āraddhāya saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayādīsu upaṭṭhahantesu yathākālaṃ paggahasamupekkhaṇehi
tika-s0302t0:713_12: bojjhaṅgānaṃ anupavattanena bhāvanāmajjhimavīthiṃ pāpetvā yathā vipassanāñāṇaṃ suppasannaṃ hutvā vahati,
tika-s0302t0:713_13: evaṃ indriyānaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇena vipassanācittaṃ sammā uttejesi,
tika-s0302t0:713_15: Sampahaṃsesīti tathā pavattiyamānāya vipassanāya samappavattabhāvanāvasena upari laddhabbabhāvanāvasena cittaṃ sampahaṃsesi,
tika-s0302t0:714_0: Manute pariññādivasena saccāni bujjhatīti muni. Teti taṃ.
tika-s0302t0:714_8: bhante”ti vadantena pakkhapātena viya vuttaṃ hotīti āha “ekā bhikkhunī na vāritā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t0:718_1: Rājagahassa dakkhiṇabhāge giri dakkhiṇāgiri ṇa- kāre a-
tika-s0302t0:718_5: Ekadivasenāti ekena divasena uppabbājesuṃ tesaṃ saddhāpabbajitābhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:719_0: Yattha cattāro vā uttari vā bhikkhū akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ ekato paṭiggaṇhitvā bhuñjanti,
tika-s0302t0:719_2: taṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti “tikabhojanaṃ paññatta”nti vacanena gaṇabhojanaṃ paṭikkhittanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t0:720_0: “Dummaṅkūnaṃ niggaho eva pesalānaṃ phāsuvihāro”ti idaṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:720_3: saṅghaṃ bhindeyyu”nti iminā kāraṇena tikabhojanaṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:721_0: Atha kiñcarahīti atha kasmā tvaṃ asampannagaṇaṃ bandhitvā carasīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:721_1: Asampannāya parisāya cārikācaraṇaṃ kulānuddayāya na hoti,
tika-s0302t0:721_2: kulānaṃ ghātitattāti adhippāyena thero “sassaghātaṃ maññe carasī”tiādimavoca.
tika-s0302t0:722_1: Uddisituṃ na jānāmi tathā cittasseva anuppannapubbattā.
tika-s0302t0:722_6: Sannipātaṭṭhānatoti saṅketaṃ katvā viya kilesarajānaṃ tattha sannijjhapavattanato.
tika-s0302t0:723_3: Kiñci sikkhekadesaṃ asesetvā ekanteneva paripūretabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:723_4: Cittuppādamattampi saṃkilesamalaṃ anuppādetvā accantameva visuddhaṃ katvā pariharitabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:723_5: Tato eva saṅkhaṃ viya likhitanti saṅkhalikhitaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:724_5: Aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassanti bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassañceva saṭṭhisahassāni ca aṭṭha ca sahassāni.
tika-s0302t0:725_0: Ayañca ayañca guṇoti sīlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā guṇoti kittento mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya kathesi.
tika-s0302t0:727_1: Taraṇaṃ vā hotu maraṇaṃ vāti mahoghaṃ ogāhanto puriso viya maccherasamuddaṃ uttaranto pacchāpi…pe…
tika-s0302t0:727_2: pādamūle ṭhapesi bhagavato dhammadesanāya maccherapahānassa kathitattā.
tika-s0302t0:728_0: Satthu guṇā kathitā nāma hontīti vuttaṃ “satthu guṇe kathentassā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:728_1: Tato paṭṭhāyāti tadā satthu sammukhā dhammassavanato paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0302t0:730_0: Adinnavipākassāti pubbe katūpacitassa sabbaso na dinnavipākassa.
tika-s0302t0:730_1: Tassa kammassāti tassa paccekabuddhassa patte piṇḍapātaṃ chinditvā kalalapūraṇakammassa.
tika-s0302t0:730_2: Tasmiṃyeva attabhāve sattasu ṭhānesu duggandhasarīratāya paṭinivattitā.
tika-s0302t0:730_4: Ghaṭaniṭṭhakāyāti tassa pantiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ ṭhapitaiṭṭhakāya saddhiṃ ghaṭetabbaiṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti.
tika-s0302t0:730_5: Bhaddake kāleti īdisiyā iṭṭhakāya icchitakāleyeva āgatāsi.
tika-s0302t0:731_2: yaṃ nimittaṃ yaṃ kāraṇā ito sukhumatarassa paṭilābho siyāti attho.
tika-s0302t0:731_4: So ca assa bārāṇasirajjaṃ dātuṃ katokāso.
tika-s0302t0:732_1: Uṇhīsaṃ vālabījanī khaggo maṇipādukā setacchattanti pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:735_4: So hi rājā paccekabuddhānaṃ vesassa diṭṭhattā “idameva bhaddaka”nti tādisaṃyeva liṅgaṃ gaṇhi.
tika-s0302t0:736_2: Brahmalokato āgantvā nibbattattā brahmacariyādhikārassa cirakālaṃ saṅgahitattā “evarūpaṃ kathaṃ mā kathethā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:737_0: Vīsati dharaṇāni “nikkha”nti vadanti. Alabhanto na vasāmīti saññāpessāmīti sambandho.
tika-s0302t0:739_2: Ito ca etto cāti te purisā samāgamaṭṭhānato magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthagāmaṃ maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagarañca
tika-s0302t0:739_3: uddissa pakkamantā aññamaññaṃ vissajjentā nāma hontīti “ito ca etto ca pesesu”nti vuttā.
tika-s0302t0:740_2: Teti ubho bhaddā ceva pippalikumāro ca.
tika-s0302t0:740_6: Vicārayiṃsu ghaṭe jalantena viya padīpena ajjhāsayena samujjalantena vimokkhabījena samussāhitacittā.
tika-s0302t0:740_7: Yantabaddhānīti sassasampādanatthaṃ tattha tattha iṭṭhakadvārakavāṭayojanavasena yantabaddhaudakanikkhamanatumbāni.
tika-s0302t0:742_0: Etesaṃ saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti nisīdīti sambandho.
tika-s0302t0:742_1: Sā pana satthu tattha nisajjā edisīti dassetuṃ “nisīdanto panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:742_4: taṃyeva mahākassapassa adiṭṭhapubbaṃ pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ aniggahetvā nisinno bhagavā “buddhavesaṃ gahetvā…pe…
tika-s0302t0:742_8: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ahosi nirantaraṃ buddharasmīhi samantato samokiṇṇattā.
tika-s0302t0:743_0: Rājagahaṃ nāḷandanti ca sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ antarāsaddayogatoti āha “rājagahassa nāḷandāya cā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:743_1: Na hi me ito aññena satthārā bhavituṃ sakkā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi sattānaṃ yathārahaṃ anusāsanasamatthassa aññassa sadevake abhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:743_2: Na hi me ito aññena sugatena bhavituṃ sakkā sobhanagamanaguṇagaṇayuttassa aññassa abhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:743_3: Na hi me ito aññena sammāsambuddhena bhavituṃ sakkā sammā sabbadhammānaṃ sayambhuñāṇena abhisambuddhassa abhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:744_2: Samannāgatanti sampannaṃ sammadeva anu anu āgataṃ upagataṃ.
tika-s0302t0:745_7: Ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā savanacittaṃ “sabbaceto”ti adhippetanti āha “cittassa thokampi bahi gantuṃ adento”ti.
tika-s0302t0:745_10: samannāharitvā ārambhato pabhuti yāva desanā nipphannā,
tika-s0302t0:745_11: tāva antarantarā pavattena sabbena samannāhāracittena dhammaṃyeva samannāharitvā.
tika-s0302t0:746_0: Saṃsārasāgare paribbhamantassa iṇaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti kilesā āsavasabhāvāpādanatoti āha “saraṇoti sakileso”ti.
tika-s0302t0:746_3: Ettha ca bhagavā paṭhamaṃ ovādaṃ therassa brāhmaṇajātikattā jātimānapahānatthamabhāsi,
tika-s0302t0:746_6: Aṭṭhame divaseti bhagavatā samāgatadivasato aṭṭhame divase.
tika-s0302t0:747_0: Maggato okkamanaṃ paṭhamataraṃ bhagavatā samāgatadivaseyeva ahosi.
tika-s0302t0:747_2: atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ pageva siddhaṃ viya vuttanti āha “desanāvārassā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t0:747_5: raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñji”nti vatvā avasarappattaṃ arahattaṃ pavedento “aṭṭhamiyā aññā udapādī”ti āha.
tika-s0302t0:747_7: Tato paraṃ bhagavatā attano kataṃ anuggahaṃ cīvaraparivattanaṃ dassento “atha kho,
tika-s0302t0:748_0: Antantenāti catugguṇaṃ katvā paññattāya saṅghāṭiyā antantena.
tika-s0302t0:748_2: bhavituṃ vaṭṭatīti etena pubbe jātiāraññakaggahaṇena ca terasa dhutaṅgā gahitā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:749_0: Bhagavato ovādaṃ bhagavato vā dhammakāyaṃ nissāya urassa vasena jātoti oraso.
tika-s0302t0:749_1: Bhagavato vā dhammasarīrassa mukhato sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyato jāto.
tika-s0302t0:749_3: Ovādadhammo eva satthārā dātabbato therena ādātabbato ovādadhammadāyādo,
tika-s0302t0:750_0: “Pabbajjā ca parisodhitā”ti vatvā tassā sammadeva sodhitabhāvaṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ, “āvuso,
tika-s0302t0:750_3: evaṃ so satthu santikā labhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0302t0:750_4: Sīhanādaṃ naditunti etthāpi sīhanādanadanā nāma desanāva,
tika-s0302t0:750_5: thero satthārā attano katānuggahameva anantarasutte vuttanayena ulliṅgeti,
tika-s0302t0:750_7: Na hi mahāthero kevalaṃ attano guṇānubhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0302t0:753_1: Yathā atītakappe atītāsu jātīsu kammakilesavasena āgato,
tika-s0302t0:753_3: yathā yathā vā pana kammaṃ katūpacitaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:753_4: tathā taṃ taṃ attabhāvaṃ āgato upagato upapannoti tathāgato,
tika-s0302t0:753_6: Etanti “evaṃ hoti bhavati tiṭṭhati sassatisama”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ.
tika-s0302t0:753_7: Atthasannissitaṃ na hotīti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthato sukhanti pasatthasannissitaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0302t0:753_8: Ādibrahmacariyakanti ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ adhippetaṃ tassa padhānabhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:753_9: Tassa pana etaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ādipaṭipadāmattaṃ na hoti anupakārakattā vilomanato ca.
tika-s0302t0:756_1: Ājānāti heṭṭhimamaggehi ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvāva jānāti paṭivijjhatīti aññā,
tika-s0302t0:758_2: Ettha ca vipassanācittasamuṭṭhānasantānavinimuttaṃ pabhāsanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ obhāso.
tika-s0302t0:758_4: Sakasakakicce saviseso hutvā pavatto adhimokkho saddhādhimokkho.
tika-s0302t0:758_9: Puna upekkhāyāti vipassanupekkhāva anena samajjhattatāya evaṃ vuttā.
tika-s0302t0:759_0: Imāni dasa ṭhānānīti imāni obhāsādīni upakkilesuppattiyā ṭhānāni upakkilesavatthūni.
tika-s0302t0:759_1: Paññā yassa paricitāti yassa paññā paricitavatī yāthāvato jānāti.
tika-s0302t0:759_2: “Imāni nissāya addhā maggappatto phalappatto aha”nti pavattaadhimāno dhammuddhaccaṃ dhammūpanissayo vikkhepo.
tika-s0302t0:759_3: Tattha kusalo hi taṃ yāthāvato jānanto na ca tattha sammohaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0302t0:760_9: Tattha sallaṃ upaṭṭhapenti kilesavinayaṃ na sandissati,
tika-s0302t0:762_0: Na sakkhiṃsu ñāṇassa avisadabhāvato. Esa nayo ito paresupi.
tika-s0302t0:763_0: Idāni “bhikkhū paṭisambhidāppattā ahesu”ntiādinā vuttameva atthaṃ kāraṇato vibhāvetuṃ puna “paṭhamabodhiyaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:763_1: Tattha paṭipattiṃ pūrayiṃsūti atīte kadā te paṭisambhidāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūrayiṃsu?
tika-s0302t0:763_3: Na hi attasammāpaṇidhiyā pubbekatapuññatāya ca vinā tādisaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0302t0:763_5: Tadā paṭipattisaddhammo antarahito nāma bhavissatīti etena ariyamaggena āsannā eva pubbabhāgapaṭipadā paṭipattisaddhammoti dasseti.
tika-s0302t0:764_3: aññasmiṃ dhamme antarahite aññatarassa dhammassa anantaradhānaṃ vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:764_4: Paṭipattiyā paccayo hoti anavasesato paṭipattikkamassa paridīpanato.
tika-s0302t0:765_0: Nanu ca sāsanaṃ osakkitaṃ pariyattiyā vattamānāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:766_0: Etesūti evaṃ mahantesu sakalaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharituṃ samatthesu catūsu mahābhūtesu.
tika-s0302t0:766_1: Tasmāti yasmā aññena kenaci atimahantenapi saddhammo na antaradhāyati,
tika-s0302t0:767_7: so etesaṃ natthīti āha “appatissāti appatissayā anīcavuttikā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:773_4: so pana atthato sampattiyevāti āha “tesaṃyeva…pe… lābho”ti.
tika-s0302t0:776_13: evaṃ pavattamāno puggalo kilesavippayogo na hotīti vuttaṃ “yathā kilesamārassa kāmo,
tika-s0302t0:779_1: Aṭṭhikacchapā vuccanti yesaṃ kapālamatthake tikhiṇā aṭṭhikoṭi hoti,
tika-s0302t0:782_0: 161. Mīḷhakāti evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena vuccamānā. Gūthapāṇakāti gūthabhakkhapāṇakā. Antoti kucchiyaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:785_1: “Ime lābhasakkāraṃ anāharantā jighacchādidukkhaṃ pāpuṇantū”ti evaṃ na sattānaṃ dukkhakāmatāya evamāhāti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0302t0:788_0: 163. Acchavisayuttāti vā diddhe gatena gatadiddhena. Tenāha “visamakkhitenā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:794_1: Kāyaṃ na rakkhati nāma chabbīsatiyā sāruppānaṃ pariccajanato.
tika-s0302t0:794_2: Vācaṃ na rakkhati nāma rāgasāmantā ca kodhasāmantā ca yāva nicchāraṇato.
tika-s0302t0:797_1: “Yassa sakkariyamānassā”ti ettha asakkārena cūbhayanti asakkārena ca ubhayañca,
tika-s0302t0:797_8: Āgatattāti phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ tassā pubbaparikammaṃ upagatattā.
tika-s0302t0:802_2: Aññaṃ vā kiccaṃ karoti pageva sīlassa chaḍḍitattā.
tika-s0302t0:807_1: Yaṃ visabhāgavatthu purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhātuṃ sakkotīti vuccati,
tika-s0302t0:807_2: tato visesato lābhasakkārova sattānaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhātuṃ sakkotīti dassento bhagavā “na tassa,
tika-s0302t0:810_0: 171. Dutiyaṃ uttānameva, tasseva atthassa kevalaṃ janapadakalyāṇīvasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:816_3: Lābhasakkārassa samudayaṃ uppattikāraṇaṃ samudayasaccavasena dukkhasaccassa uppattihetutāvasena.
tika-s0302t0:819_1: Lābhasakkārasiloko narakādīsu nibbattentoti idaṃ tannissayaṃ kilesagaṇaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0302t0:819_3: Imaṃ manussaattabhāvaṃ nāseti manussattaṃ puna nibbattituṃ appadānavasena.
tika-s0302t0:830_2: Na hi paccekabodhiyaṃ niyatagatiko antarā maggaphalāni adhigantuṃ bhabboti.
tika-s0302t0:830_5: Samucchedamagamā katūpacitassa mahato pāpadhammassa balena tasmiṃ attabhāve samucchedabhāvato,
tika-s0302t0:830_9: tasmā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve tādisānaṃ puggalānaṃ atekicchatā,
tika-s0302t0:830_10: aññathā sammattaniyāmo viya micchattaniyāmo accantiko siyā.
tika-s0302t0:830_13: tasmā yathā “sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggo eva bālo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0302t0:830_15: Yādise hi paccaye paṭicca puggalo taṃ dassanaṃ gaṇhi,
tika-s0302t0:830_17: puna acintappativatte paccaye patitato sīsukkhipanamassa na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:833_1: Kāle sampatteti gabbhassa paripākagatattā vijāyanakāle sampatte.
tika-s0302t0:839_1: Mātupi hetūti attano mātuyā uppannaanatthāvahassa pahānahetupi.
tika-s0302t0:845_1: Ekavihārīti catūsupi iriyāpathesu ekākī hutvā viharanto.
tika-s0302t0:845_6: Ātāpīti vīriyasampannoti sabbaso kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanavasena pavattavīriyasamaṅgībhūto.
tika-s0302t0:845_9: Hutvā abhāvākārenāti uppattito pubbe avijjamāno paccayasamavāyena hutvā uppajjitvā bhaṅguparamasaṅkhātena abhāvākārena.
tika-s0302t0:845_14: Cakkhuñhi upādāya vikārāpajjanena vipariṇamantaṃ vināsaṃ paṭipīḷaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0302t0:846_0: Pasādāva gahitā dvārabhāvappattassa adhippetattā. Sammasanacāracittaṃ dvārabhūtamanoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:847_5: Evañhi avadhāraṇaṃ sātthakaṃ hoti aññathā tena apanetabbassa abhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:850_1: Ākāsadhātu rūpaparicchedatāya rūpapariyāpannanti adhippāyena “sesāhi rūpa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:858_1: Dutiyavagge attanoti āyasmā rāhulo attano saviññāṇakaṃ kāyaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0302t0:858_3: Parasantāne vā arūpe dhamme aggahetvā rūpakāyameva gaṇhanto vadati.
tika-s0302t0:858_4: Apare “asaññasattānaṃ attabhāvaṃ sandhāya tathā vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-s0302t0:858_10: maggakkhaṇe abhisamayavasena suṭṭhu attapaccakkhena ñāṇena passati.
tika-s0302t0:864_6: Tena pana vipassanāya kathitattā kathitā evāti.
tika-s0302t0:864_7: Taṃtaṃdesanānusārena hi thero te dhamme paripākaṃ pāpesi.
tika-s0302t0:864_8: Tathā hi bhagavā dutiyavaggaṃ anāyācitopi desesi.
tika-s0302t0:869_4: kasmā ca sitaṃ pātvākāsī”ti taṃ sabbaṃ pakāsetuṃ “yvāya”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:870_2: atha kho eko petoti āha “petaloke nibbatta”nti.
tika-s0302t0:870_4: Na āpāthaṃ āgacchantīti devattabhāvā viya na āpāthaṃ āgacchanti pakatiyā.
tika-s0302t0:870_5: Tesaṃ pana ruciyā āpāthaṃ āgaccheyyuṃ manussānaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:870_7: Attano ca sampattiṃ buddhañāṇassa ca sampattinti paccekaṃ sampattisaddo yojetabbo.
tika-s0302t0:870_9: Tattha attano sampattiṃ anussaritvā sitaṃ pātvākāsīti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:871_7: lokassa cakkhubhūtāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0302t0:872_1: Aññatra hi “yatra hi nāmā”ti attho vuccati.
tika-s0302t0:872_2: Appamāṇe sattanikāye te ca kho vibhāgena kāmabhavādibhede bhave,
tika-s0302t0:872_5: tathārūpe sattāvāse ca sabbaññutaññāṇañca me upanetuṃ paccakkhaṃ karontena.
tika-s0302t0:873_4: Balavatā goghātakakammena vipāke dīyamāne aladdhokāsaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ tasmiṃ vipakkavipāke idāni laddhokāsaṃ “avasesakamma”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:873_8: Yādise hi ārammaṇe pubbe taṃ kammaṃ tassa ca vipāko pavatto,
tika-s0302t0:873_9: tādiseyeva ārammaṇe idaṃ kammaṃ imassa vipāko ca pavattoti katvā vuttaṃ “tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:873_10: Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā “so eva tittiro,
tika-s0302t0:873_12: Nimittaṃ ahosīti pubbe katūpacitassa petūpapattinibbattanavasena katokāsassa tassa kammassa nimittabhūtaṃ
tika-s0302t0:873_13: idāni tathā upaṭṭhahantaṃ tassa vipākassa nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0302t0:876_1: Gomaṃsapesiyo katvāti gāviṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā gomaṃsaṃ phāletvā pesiyo katvā.
tika-s0302t0:883_0: 206. Nivāpapuṭṭheti attanā dinnanivāpena posite. Asinā vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇanto.
tika-s0302t0:891_2: amutra vā sutaṃ idha sūcetīti sūcako.
tika-s0302t0:893_2: So hi gāmajanakāyaṃ kūṭeti vañcetīti gāmakūṭakoti vuccati.
tika-s0302t0:900_0: 214. Mātugāmo sassāmiko attano phasse anissaro. Vaṭṭitvāti bhassitvā aparaṃ gantvā.
tika-s0302t0:904_7: Tassa kira raññoti tassa kāliṅgassa rañño.
tika-s0302t0:907_0: 217. Asīsakaṃ kabandhaṃ hutvā nibbatti kammāyūhanakāle tathā nimittaggahaṇaparicayato.
tika-s0302t0:914_1: Kūṭaṃ gacchantīti kūṭacchiddassa anupavisanavasena kūṭaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0302t0:914_8: Appamattāti pana iminā tassa upāyo dassito.
tika-s0302t0:917_2: sugatisaṃvattaniyassa kammassa appakattā evaṃ devesupīti hīnūdāharaṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:917_3: Appatarā hi sattā ye devesu jāyanti,
tika-s0302t0:920_3: Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā yuttayānaṃ viya katāti yathā yuttaṃ ājaññarathaṃ
tika-s0302t0:920_7: Vatthu viya katā sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena suvisodhitamariyādaṃ viya katā.
tika-s0302t0:920_11: Suṭṭhu samāraddhāti mettābhāvanāya matthakappattiyā sammadeva sampāditā.
tika-s0302t0:926_1: Agge paharitvāti tiṇhaphalasattiyā agge hatthena vā muṭṭhinā vā pahāraṃ datvā.
tika-s0302t0:926_4: Ekato katvāti kalikādibhāvena vīsatiṃsapiṇḍāni ekajjhaṃ katvā.
tika-s0302t0:926_7: Alliyāpento te dvepi dhārā ekato samphusāpento.
tika-s0302t0:929_2: Idāni tassa thiratarabhāvaṃ paricchedato dassetuṃ “daḷhadhanū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:929_12: so pana majjhimapurisassa vasena edisaṃ tassa balaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:929_15: Kataṃ rājakulādīsu upagantvā asanaṃ sarakkhepo etehīti katūpasanāti āha “rājakulādīsu dassitasippā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:930_0: “Bodhisatto cattāri kaṇḍāni āharī”ti vatvā tameva atthaṃ vitthārato dassento “tadā kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:930_2: Aggi uṭṭhahīti sīghapatanasantāpena ca sūriyarasmisantāpassa āsannabhāvena ca usumā uṭṭhahi.
tika-s0302t0:931_1: Pattakaṭāhena otthaṭapatto viyāti pihitapatto viya ahosi,
tika-s0302t0:931_2: vegasā patanena nagarassa upari ākāsassa nirikkhaṇaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0302t0:931_3: Sañcāritattā anekahaṃsasahassasadiso paññāyi seyyathāpi bodhisattassa dhanuggahakāle sarakūṭādidassane.
tika-s0302t0:932_2: Sūriyamaṇḍalañhi atisīghena javena gacchantampi paññāsayojanāyāmavitthataṃ attano vipulatāya pabhassaratāya
tika-s0302t0:932_4: javanahaṃso pana tādisena sūriyena saddhiṃ javena gacchanto na paññāyeyya.
tika-s0302t0:932_7: Gantvā gahite sotuṃ ghaṇḍaṃ piḷandhāpetvā sayaṃ puratthābhimukho nisinno.
tika-s0302t0:933_3: Bahuvacananiddeso pana pāḷiyaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe anekasatasaṅkhassa jīvitindriyassa upalabbhanato.
tika-s0302t0:933_5: Tato yathāvuttadevatānaṃ javato sīghataraṃ khīyati ittarakhaṇattā.
tika-s0302t0:936_0: Bhedoti bhaṅgo. Na sakkā paññāpetuṃ tatopi ativiya ittarakhaṇattā.
tika-s0302t0:939_1: Aññe rājāno ca bhāgaṃ gaṇhantā ime viya dasabhāgaṃ gaṇhantīti tesamayaṃ anugati paññāyati.
tika-s0302t0:939_3: Idāni taṃ ādito paṭṭhāya āgamanānukkamaṃ dassetuṃ “himavante kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t0:940_3: Pubbe pharitvā tiṭṭhantassa dvādasa yojanāni pamāṇo etassāti dvādasayojanappamāṇo, saddo.
tika-s0302t0:940_4: Athassa anekasatakāle gacchante antosālāyampi dukkhena suyyittha āṇisaṅghāṭamattattā.
tika-s0302t0:941_3: Tathā hi tattha tā tā gāthā duviññeyyarūpā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0302t0:941_6: tasmā taṃ pāḷivasena “gambhīra”nti vuttaṃ “pāḷivasena gambhīrā sallasuttasadisā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:941_7: Iminā nayena “atthavasena gambhīrā”ti ettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t0:941_13: Sattasuññatadhammamattamevāti sattena attanā suññataṃ kevalaṃ dhammamattameva.
tika-s0302t0:941_14: Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbanti ca liṅgavacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha “uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe cā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:941_17: taṃ tena katanti vuccatīti āha “kavitāti kavīhi katā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:941_24: Tesaṃ sāvakehīti “buddhānaṃ sāvakā”ti apaññātānaṃ yesaṃ kesañci sāvakehi.
tika-s0302t0:944_3: Licchavī pana khadiradaṇḍaṃ upadhānaṃ katvā tadā vihariṃsu.
tika-s0302t0:944_5: Pakativijjusaññito natthi etesaṃ khaṇo vijjhaneti akkhaṇavedhino tato sīghataraṃ vijjhanato.
tika-s0302t0:945_1: Te sandhāyāti te tathārūpe padhānakammikabhikkhū sandhāya.
tika-s0302t0:945_2: Idaṃ idāni vuccamānaṃ atthajātaṃ vuttaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:945_4: Padhānānuyuñjanavelāya nivedanavasena tattha tattha ekajjhaṃ pahataghaṇḍinigghoseneva ekaghaṇḍinigghoso,
tika-s0302t0:945_5: tattha tattha paṇṇasālādīsu vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena ekapadhānabhūto.
tika-s0302t0:948_4: Aparisuddhāsayatāya neva guṇavaṇṇāya na ñāṇabalāya hoti.
tika-s0302t0:951_9: Taṃ pana yathāāpannāya āpattiyā “desanā”tveva vuccatīti āha “desanā paññāyatī”ti.
tika-s0302t0:954_1: Ettakampīti iminā jarasiṅgālena laddhabbaṃ cittassādamattampi na labhissati sakalameva kappaṃ sabbaso
tika-s0302t0:962_1: Sāvakānaṃ ālāpoti sāvakānaṃ sabrahmacāriṃ uddissa ālāpo.
tika-s0302t0:962_2: Buddhehi sadisā mā homāti buddhāciṇṇaṃ samudācāraṃ akathentehi sāvakehi,
tika-s0302t0:962_6: Dutiyajjhāne vitakkavicārā nirujjhanti tesaṃ nirodheneva tassa jhānassa uppādetabbato.
tika-s0302t0:962_7: Yesaṃ nirodhāti yesaṃ vacīsaṅgārānaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ nirujjhanena suvikkhambhitabhāvena saddāyatanaṃ
tika-s0302t0:962_11: na titthiyānaṃ mūgabbataggahaṇaṃ viya aparisuddhoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t0:963_0: Ārammaṇabhūtena vitakkena saha gatā pavattāti vitakkasahagatāti āha “vitakkārammaṇā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:963_4: Saññāmanasikārāpīti tatiyajjhānādhigamāya pavattiyamānā saññāmanasikārāpi hānabhāgiyāva ahesuṃ,
tika-s0302t0:963_6: Sammā ṭhapehīti bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ pahāya sammā ajjhattameva cittaṃ ṭhapehi.
tika-s0302t0:963_7: Ekaggaṃ karohīti teneva vikkhepapaṭibāhanena avihatamānasatāya cittasamādhānavasena ekaggaṃ karohi.
tika-s0302t0:963_8: Āropehīti īsakampi bahumpi apatitaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe āropehi.
tika-s0302t0:963_13: Vaḍḍhetvāti uttari uttari visesabhāgiyabhāvāpādanena samādhiṃ paññañca brūhetvā brūhetvā.
tika-s0302t0:966_1: Atiuḷārampi sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ sabbatthameva sabbaso chandarāgassa suppahīnattā.
tika-s0302t0:971_0: Catubhūmakadhammesu labbhamānattā paññāya “catubhūmakadhamme anupavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:971_6: Dvīsupi etesūti samādhilakkhaṇavipassanālakkhaṇesu sammāsambuddho nipphattiṃ gato.
tika-s0302t0:974_3: Yasmā jhānānaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ cittaṃ nissāya paccayo hotiyeva,
tika-s0302t0:974_11: Sithilamārabbhāti sithilaṃ vīriyārambhaṃ katvāti atthoti āha “sithilaṃ vīriyaṃ pavattetvā”ti.
tika-s0302t0:977_2: Atikkantarūpoti attano rūpasampattiyā rūpasobhāya atikkamitvā ṭhitarūpo,
tika-s0302t0:977_6: Chavivaṇṇasundaratāyāti chavivaṇṇassa ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānassa ca sobhanabhāvena.
tika-s0302t0:981_0: Guṇe āvajjetvāti attanā jānanakaniyāmena satthuno kāyaguṇe ca cārittaguṇe ca āvajjetvā manasi katvā.
tika-s0302t0:986_4: Sā pana dutavilambitakhalitavasena appasannalūkhatādidosarahitā hotīti āha “pura…pe…
tika-s0302t0:986_13: Tā hi cattāri saccāni paricchijja āpādenti paṭipādenti pavattenti.
tika-s0302t0:989_4: taggahaṇeneva vīriyanissitadhutaṅgassa ca samādāya vattanaṃ dīpitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:993_0: Vācāya sannitodakenāti vacanasaṅkhātena samantato niccaṃ katvā upatudanato sannitudakena.
tika-s0302t0:994_7: Tatthevāti tassāyeva sālāya dvāraṃ nissāya dvārasamīpe.
tika-s0302t0:994_14: Pabujjhiṃsūti niddāya pabujjhiṃsu pakatiyā pabujjhanavelāya upagatattā.
tika-s0302t0:996_2: yaṃ tena tāpasena pāramitāparibhāvanasamiddhāhi nānāvihārasamāpattiparipūritāhi sīladiṭṭhisampadādīhi
tika-s0302t0:996_3: susaṅkhatasantāne mahākaruṇādhivāse mahāsatte bodhisatte ariyūpavādakammaṃ abhisapasaṅkhātaṃ pharusavacanaṃ
tika-s0302t0:996_5: taṃ mahāsattassa khettavisesabhāvato tassa ca ajjhāsayapharusatāya diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hutvā sace so mahāsattaṃ na khamāpeti,
tika-s0302t0:996_7: khamāpite pana mahāsatte payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ āpajjati ahosikammabhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:996_11: Tena hi ubbāḷhā manussā bodhisattassa santike tāpasaṃ ānetvā khamāpesuṃ.
tika-s0302t0:996_12: Sopi ca mahāsattassa guṇe jānitvā tasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādesi.
tika-s0302t0:996_13: Yaṃ panassa matthake mattikāpiṇḍassa ṭhapanaṃ tassa sattadhā phālanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0302t0:996_15: Aññathā hi ime pabbajitā samānā cittassa vasaṃ vattanti,
tika-s0302t0:996_16: na pana cittamattano vase vattāpentīti mahāsattampi tena sadisaṃ katvā gaṇheyyuṃ,
tika-s0302t0:999_6: Sabbā khandhāyatanadhātuyo cāti iminā upādiṇṇānampi anupādiṇṇānampi dvidhā pavattalokiyadhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ avisesetvā vuttattā.
tika-s0302t0:999_10: Tadeva sabbanti heṭṭhā tīsupi padesu idha sabbaggahaṇena gahitaṃ tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:999_12: Taṇhā khīyati etthāti taṇhakkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne vimuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:999_13: Tamahanti taṃ uttamapuggalaṃ ekavihāriṃ brūmi taṇhādutiyassa abhāvato.
tika-s0302t0:999_14: Ettha ca pariññāpahānābhisamayakathanena itarampi abhisamayaṃ atthato kathitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:1002_5: Kiñci sāsananti apubbapavattidīpakaṃ kiñci vacananti pucchi.
tika-s0302t0:1002_6: Pīti uppajji yathā taṃ suciraṃ katābhinīhāratāya paripakkañāṇassa.
tika-s0302t0:1002_9: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyadukkhato saṃsāradukkhato ca apatante dhāretīti dhammo.
tika-s0302t0:1003_0: Navasatasahassāni adāsi devī. Tumheti rājiniṃ gāravena bahuvacanena vadati. Rāgoti anugacchantarāgo.
tika-s0302t0:1004_1: Kammakilesehi pajātattā pajāti pajāsaddo janitasaddena samānatthoti āha – “janite,
tika-s0302t0:1004_4: Tattha hi vipassanāñāṇamanomayiddhīhi saha cha abhiññā “aṭṭha vijjā”ti āgatā.
tika-s0302t0:1004_8: Jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāhitena cittena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnoti āha –
tika-s0302t0:1005_0: “Maṅgalaṃ bhagavā buddho, dhammo saṅgho ca maṅgalaṃ;
tika-s0302t0:1007_0: Pūjaṃ kāretvā ekaṃ agārikadhammakathikaṃ upāsakaṃ āha.
tika-s0302t0:1007_1: Ettha ca “jhāyī tapatī”ti iminā ārammaṇūpanijjhānānaṃ gahitattā dhammaratanaṃ gahitameva.
tika-s0302t0:1010_3: Sammā cirarattaṃ cirakālaṃ sameti etesaṃ atthīti cirarattaṃsametikā.
tika-s0302t0:1010_6: Ayaṃ sāsanadhammo ajjhāsayato payogato ca sammā saṃsandati sameti,
tika-s0302t0:1010_7: tasmā majjhe bhinnaṃ viya samameva na visadisaṃ.
tika-s0302t0:1010_8: Kiñca tato eva buddhena bhagavatā paveditadhammavinaye etesaṃ paṭipattisāsanadhammo sobhati virocatīti attho.
tika-s0302t0:1010_9: Ariyappavediteti ariyena sammāsambuddhena sammadeva pakāsite ariyadhamme.
tika-s0302t0:1010_10: Sammadeva samucchedapaṭippassaddhivinayānaṃ vasena suṭṭhu vinītā sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamena.
